Very good. Can be used daily ; gives an unmatched sense of having "scrubbed down" when you need it. Perfect for sensitive skin prone to breakouts and redness (hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic).

Consistency - watery gel with mild granulations.

Amount required - very, very little (which makes the price worth it. It'll last you for ages.)

Scent - clean and refreshing, one of the main things that attracted me.

Lather - not bubbly, but obvious.

Washing off - wash off at least twice to remove the residue. In my experience, that's how much is required.

Feel - a thorough cleanse. Skin may feel a little tight subsequently, but that's the case with most soaps or facewashes.

text: CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser Face Wash For Normal to Dry Skin | Hyaluronic Acid + 3 Essential Ceramides | Cleanses and Hydrates without Disrupting Natural Skin Barrier of the Face and Body | 473ml

Product Description.product_description: CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser was developed with dermatologists to cleanse and refresh the skin without over-stripping it or leaving it feeling tight and dry. Featuring three types of essential ceramides for skin to help strengthen the skin’s protective barrier and hydrating hyaluronic acid, this non-comedogenic face wash is an effective yet non-irritating way to start off any skincare regimen for normal to dry skin—and it uses MVE Technology to provide 24 hour hydration. Contains sodium hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid) to hydrate and protect the skin’s barrier. Learn more about the benefits of hyaluronic acid for skin. Non-comedogenic skincare products are those that are formulated in a way that does not block pores. Suitable for normal to dry skin Moisturising Multivesicular Technology [MVE] to maintain hydration levels in the skin for 24 hours. Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help strengthen and maintain the skin’s natural barrier Hyaluronic acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture Non-comedogenic, non-irritating and fragrance-free Developed with dermatologists Proud supporters of the Eczema Association of Australasia Inc (EAA). The EAA stamp identifies products that are suitable for eczema prone skin. This cleanser cleans and hydrates normal to dry skin. If you have very dry, rough, or bumpy skin, the SA Smoothing Cleanser contains 0.5% salicylic acid, plus niacinamide to smooth and soften skin.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser was developed with dermatologists to cleanse and refresh the skin without over-stripping it or leaving it feeling tight and dry.
Gently removes dirt, oil and makeup without leaving skin tight or dry. Ceramides: Help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier. MVE: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for all day hydration.
Suitable for normal to dry skin.
Non-comedogenic, non-irritating and fragrance-free.
Developed with dermatologists and #1 Dermatologist Recommended Skincare Brand in the US* Disclaimer: *IQVIA ProVoice Survey, US Dermatologists, 38 skincare categories, rolling 12 months to October 2023.

Ho comprato questo prodotto dopo aver visto svariati video di James Welsh. Devo dire che non sono mai stata regolare con la skincare, perciò la mia pelle era in condizioni critiche, anche per l'uso prolungato della mascherina, che ovviamente non aiuta.
Ho visto dei risultati utilizzando il prodotto per giusto una settimana, e all'inizio ero scettica.
Consiglio di utilizzare questo cleanser, perché nonostante io usi solamente questo e una crema viso, i risultati si vedono. La pelle è decisamente più idratata e ha un aspetto più sano.
Ovviamente questo è un prodotto di media qualità (a quanto pare), perché il ragazzo ne consiglia tre, per tre fasce di prezzo differenti, ma fa il suo ed è in un formato a vita, essenzialmente.
Sicuramente dovrò aggiungere alla lista altri prodotti per rendere la mia pelle più sana, ma ammetto che questo farà parte della lista.

Consiglio di scegliere il tipo di cleanser in base al tipo di pelle che avete, così farà meglio il suo lavoro. Spero di esservi stata utile!

Hangi versiyonunu alsam diye düşünürken ani bi kararla bunu aldım. Yanaklarımda sivilceler var ama genel olarak ağız çevrem ve yanaklarım kurudur. Aslında cildim karma diyebilirim ama dönem dönem yine ağız çevremde atopi gözlediğim olur. Bu aklıma gelince daha fazla düşünmeden bunu aldım. Akneler için olanı fazla pahalı geldi açıkçası. Neyse, şunu diyebilirim ki ilk kullanımda bu kadar hissettireceğini düşünmemiştim. Yapısı bi tık kremsi ve beyaz. Aşırı köpürüp arınması zor bi ürün değil. Aksine yüzümü durularken daha az uğraştım. Ben genelde makyaj temizlemek için ekstra adımlardan kaçınan biri olarak temizleme jelimi aynı zamanda bunun için kullanıyorum. Ve ilk yıkamada yüzüm tertemizdi ama yine de garantiye almak için ikinci sefer yıkadım. Kuruladıktan sonra cildime krem sürmüşüm gibi hissettirdi. Asla kuruluk yapmadı. Bildiğiniz krem sürmüşüm dokusu vardı ve asla ağır bi yapıda da değildi. Kullandıkça yorumumu güncellerim. Şimdilik izlenimin çok iyi.

customer_review_foreign-R35RMC6VWG3M9T.review:
Ho la pelle prevalentemente secca e molto, molto sensibile. Questo detergente è parecchio buono perché non ha profumo, non fa schiuma (e il fatto che non la faccia non significa che non stia svolgendo il suo lavoro), è delicato e idrata bene. Per me che mi ritrovo il viso arrossato e la pelle che tira con la maggior parte dei detergenti, direi che è più che ottimo. Ha la consistenza di un latte detergente, tuttavia non credo sia adatto per struccarsi, al massimo è da usare dopo essersi già struccati con i dischetti o le salviette, per togliere gli ultimi residui.
Chapeau al venditore che, nonostante la situazione attuale e il fatto che Amazon indicasse la data di arrivo tra il 27 e il 30 aprile (ordinato il 20 sera), mi ha recapitato il pacco il 22! Ben sigillato e con lo scontrino.

text: CeraVe Foaming Cleanser Gel Face Wash For Normal to Oily Skin, Removes Oil without Disrupting the Protective Skin Barrier, For Face + Body, Niacinamide + Ceramides, Fragrance Free, Oil Control, 236ml

Product Description.product_description: Body Cleanser & Face Wash For Oily Skin OIL CONTROL Cleanses and removes excess sebum without disrupting the protective skin moisture barrier. A foaming facial cleanser is ideal for removing excess oil, dirt and makeup—and choosing one that's gentle, won’t disrupt your skin’s natural protective barrier and contains ingredients that help maintain moisture balance can make all the difference. CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser features ceramides, hyaluronic acid and niacinamide to help restore the skin’ moisture barrier, attract hydration and calm the skin. CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser was developed with dermatologists to deeply cleanse, remove excess oil and refresh the skin without over-stripping it or leaving it feeling tight and dry. Featuring three essential ceramides, hyaluronic acid and niacinamide, this gel-based foaming cleanser is an effective yet non-irritating way to cleanse and care for your normal to oily skin. Available in 236ML and 473ML Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Oil-Free Cleanser gently foams to deeply cleanse without stripping moisture from the skin and supporting the skin moisture barrier. This cleanser for oily skin is formulated with 3 essential ceramides, niacinamide, and hyaluronic acid, effectively removes excess oil, dirt and makeup. CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser is fragrance free, sulfate free, paraben-free, oil free & allergy tested. Sebum is an oily, waxy substance produced by the sebaceous glands to help moisture and support your skin. Those with oily skin types often have excess sebum, which can result in skin problems. The CeraVe Foaming Oil-Free Face Wash is formulated specifically for normal-to-oily skin types. This oil-free face wash for oily skin has a non-comedogenic formula which means that it will not clog your pores preventing formation of acne or other skin concerns caused by blocked pores. If you have normal to dry skin, discover the Hydrating Cleanser for effective results. Proud supported of the Eczema Association of Australasia Inc (EAA. The EAA stamp identifies products that are suitable for eczema prone skin.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Oil-Free Cleanser gently foams to deeply cleanse without stripping moisture from the skin and supporting the skin moisture barrier.
Cleanses and removes excess sebum without disrupting the protective skin moisture barrier.
Suitable for normal to oily skin.
Fragrance free, Sulfate free, Paraben-free, Oil-free & allergy tested.
Developed with dermatologists and #1 Dermatologist Recommended Skincare Brand in the US* Disclaimer: *IQVIA ProVoice Survey, US Dermatologists, 38 skincare categories, rolling 12 months to October 2023.

customer_review_foreign-RK5H9FE5HLTTN.review_title: No me deja la piel con esa sensación de tirantez. Me encanta.
customer_review_foreign-RK5H9FE5HLTTN.review:
Llevo pocos días usando este gel limpiador y hasta ahora estoy muy satisfecha con los resultados. Lo que más me ha gustado es que no contiene perfume, lo que lo hace ideal para pieles sensibles como la mía. Mi piel tiende a resecarse con facilidad y a veces incluso se irrita con otros productos, pero con este limpiador no he tenido ese problema. No me ha causado resequedad ni sensación de picor, algo que valoro muchísimo.

Aunque es un limpiador espumoso, no lo encuentro abrasivo en absoluto. Deja la piel limpia y fresca sin esa sensación de tirantez que otros productos suelen causar. Lo he estado usando tanto para la cara como para el cuerpo y, hasta ahora, mi piel ha respondido muy bien. En resumen, es una excelente opción si tienes la piel delicada y buscas un limpiador suave pero eficaz.

Ho provato la mousse detergente viso L'OrealCerave e sono rimasto molto soddisfatto del suo effetto detergente delicato ma efficace. La sua formula leggera e senza sapone lo rende adatto a tutti i tipi di pelle, incluso quello sensibile.

Pro:
👍 Formula leggera e senza sapone che deterge delicatamente la pelle senza causare irritazioni
🧼 Texture in mousse che si espande facilmente sulla pelle, coprendo le aree più difficili da raggiungere

Contro:

La sua texture in mousse si espande facilmente sulla pelle, coprendo le aree più difficili da raggiungere, ed è ideale per tutti i tipi di pelle, inclusa quella sensibile. Inoltre, potrebbe non essere in grado di rimuovere completamente il trucco resistente all'acqua. Nel complesso, lo consiglio per la sua efficacia e delicatezza.

customer_review_foreign-RC35BMP8T3HS4.review:
Conveniente, senza profumo (per alcune persone può essere irritante), texture gradevole, ricco di agenti lenitivi, idratanti, niacinamide (seboregolatrice) e soprattutto fa perfettamente quello che un buon detergente viso dovrebbe fare: togliere il trucco e lo sporco della giornata (e lo fa davvero benissimo) senza doverne usare una quantità esagerata (ne basta una dose, in pratica schiacciando la pompa una sola volta) e non lascia la pelle del viso che tira.
È davvero formulato in modo che non aggredisca la nostra barriera protettiva, anzi la aiuta ad essere più forte. Tant'è vero che io, dopo anni di trattamenti e prodotti sbagliati e aggressivi, ero arrivata ad avere una pelle screpolata intorno al naso e la bocca e la pelle in generale molto sensibile e reattiva ad ogni cosa. Dopo un solo mese di detersione mattina e sera (accompagnato da una semplice crema idratante alla sera e la crema solare durante il giorno) ho potuto veder scomparire le pellicine ed essere felice di avere di nuovo una pelle la cui barriera riesce a proteggermi.

Ps. Comprato l'8 maggio 2020 e sto scrivendo la recensione il 12 settembre 2020; ho ancora un quarto del flacone nonostante l'abbia usato religiosamente mattina e sera, tutti i giorni. La mia pelle è rimpolpata, non ha fastidi e non reagisce più arrossandosi continuamente ad ogni piccolo tocco. Fate voi!

I’ve been using CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser for oily skin for a few weeks now, and it’s been a total game changer for my skincare routine! I have struggled with oily skin for years, constantly dealing with that midday shine and occasional breakouts. This cleanser has truly helped balance my skin.

The formula is gentle but effective, removing excess oil and impurities without leaving my face feeling stripped or dry. I love that it includes ceramides and hyaluronic acid, which help to keep my skin hydrated and maintain its natural barrier. After using this cleanser, my skin feels clean, refreshed, and soft.

I’ve also noticed a significant reduction in breakouts and overall oiliness throughout the day. It has a nice, light lather and rinses off easily, leaving no residue behind. If you have oily or combination skin, I highly recommend giving CeraVe a try. It’s made a noticeable difference for me, and I’ll definitely be sticking with it!

customer_review_foreign-R4LZ2KMU5KWOA.review:
Después de llevar 3 meses usándolo puedo dar mi opinión para quien le pueda servir.

Desde siempre he tenido la piel grasa y con brotes de acné aunque con los años la cosa se ha tranquilizado,con esto de las mascarillas la pesadilla ha vuelto.

Empecé a comprar productos para la piel grasa y solo empeoraba,esos productos son muy agresivos,te eliminan la grasa pero también la hidratación y acabas con la piel reseca,llena de pielecitas y creando 3 veces más grasa...es un bucle...

No me enrollaré mucho más y diré que es el MEJOR limpiador que he probado en mi vida,en serio,notas que te deja la piel limpia pero suave,hidratada...

También os contaré que mis brotes desaparecieron,algún granito de escapa pero nada del otro mundo,algo puntual aunque esto puede ser debido al conjunto de lo que uso.

Para los que tengáis este problema,os voy a dar mi rutina por si os puede ayudar.

Ceravé + niacinamide 10% the ordinary + hidratante (la que mejor os funcione) yo utilizo la de Mercadona para piel grasa de 2.5€ pero creo que la han quitado...

Con esto tengo la cara mejor que nunca,espero que os sirva ;)

Effective Cleansing:
The cleanser effectively removes dirt, oil, and makeup without leaving my skin feeling stripped or dry. My face feels incredibly clean and refreshed after each use.

Perfect for Oily Skin:
As someone with oily skin, I appreciate how well this cleanser manages oil production. It leaves my skin feeling balanced and less shiny throughout the day.

Incorporating niacinamide, this cleanser helps to calm and soothe my skin. I've noticed a reduction in redness and irritation, which is a huge plus for me.

Essential Ceramides:
The inclusion of three essential ceramides helps to restore and maintain the skin's natural barrier. My skin feels healthier and more resilient since I started using this cleanser.

Gentle and Non-Irritating:
Despite its effectiveness, the cleanser is gentle and non-irritating. It's fragrance-free and non-comedogenic, making it suitable for sensitive skin.

Conclusion:
The CeraVe Foaming Cleanser for Normal to Oily Skin is a game changer in my skincare routine. Its ability to cleanse deeply while maintaining the skin's natural balance makes it a standout product. Highly recommended for those with normal to oily skin looking for an effective, gentle cleanser.

customer_review_foreign-R2VIUCPELPCLE.review_title: I have come to love this for when I use sunscreen
customer_review_foreign-R2VIUCPELPCLE.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 August 2024
customer_review_foreign-R2VIUCPELPCLE.review:
Update: I stopped double cleansing when I wear sunscreen and used just this by itself and it does so lovely on my skin! The problem I had was not only when I double cleanse my skin doesn't like that so instead I cleanse with BOJ balm or this gel cleanser and then use a toner to make sure everything is removed. But the other problem was when I used it with the water too warm and it flared my rosacea. For the last few evenings I've used this without any other cleanser and lukewarm or cool water and my skin does so much better. Just love BOJ!

---Original review ---

I don't use this BOJ Green Plum cleanser every day. This is only for those occasions when I double cleanse after wearing a particularly heavy SPF sunscreen, or maybe if I wear makeup (which is rare since I work remotely).

It's a little drying for my dry aging skin. If you have more oily skin, you may love this. I am biased to Beauty of Joseon products, so basically they can do no wrong - lol - but this isn't my favorite cleanser since it is a little drying. Though they do indicate it is 'pore cleansing' so that should have been my clue!

I love BOJ ginseng oil based cleanser. And their cleansing balm. Those are my go-tos. I use the oil based cleanser every day. I'll use the balm as the first step in double cleansing or use it on its own for makeup or SPF removal.

I won't reorder this but it's not because it is not a great cleanser, it's just not for my aging rosacea-prone skin type.

customer_review_foreign-R33MYIO5WXMFIN.review_title: Good cleaning action, a bit drying
customer_review_foreign-R33MYIO5WXMFIN.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 December 2024
customer_review_foreign-R33MYIO5WXMFIN.review:
I don't suffer from acne but I do like to use a exfoliating cleanser a few times a week, so I ordered this BHA Acne Foam Cleansing made by NatureONE.

The main blemish busters in this cleanser are lauric acid and salicylic acid. Salicylic acid has been around forever and is a proven success for fighting acne, but newer studies have shown that lauric acid also has a lot of potential for attaining clear skin. In addition to those, this product also contains the antibacterial chlorphenesin, and a good blend of humectants and emollients.

I had hoped that the hydrating and moisturizing ingredients in this cleanser would help it to not dry out my skin so much. It's definitely a trade-off - after using this cleanser my skin does feel tight and slightly dry but it's worth it to me for the benefit of the BHA in it. And besides, I always moisturize after cleansing.

There is no added fragrance in this cleanser but it does smell of the peppermint oil that it contains. It has decent foaming action and I love that the surfactants and preservatives used are not harsh. It is a pretty clean formula with no sulfates, parabens, cyclic silicones or fragrance, but it does contain polyethylene glycol in the form of PEG-60 hydrogenated castor oil. The issue with PEGs is that during their creation toxic byproducts are released, which can then contaminate the final product. These toxic byproducts include ethylene oxide, a known carcinogen and 1,4-dioxane, a suspected carcinogen. I avoid skin care products with PEGs, so after using this cleanser a couple times I have stopped.

Currently this cleanser is selling for $18.95 and that is a pretty good deal considering all the good ingredients it contains. One star docked for the presence of a PEG, but other than that it is a nice cleanser.

I’ve been using the COSRX Low pH Cleanser for a while now, and it’s become one of those products I always come back to. It’s super gentle on the skin but still leaves my face feeling clean without that tight, dry feeling afterward.

The scent is kind of herbal/tea tree-ish, not super strong, but worth mentioning in case you're sensitive to fragrance. Personally, I don’t mind it. The gel texture is really nice and easy to work into the skin, and it rinses off easily too.

Overall, a great everyday cleanser that’s affordable and reliable. If you like your skincare simple but effective, this is a solid choice.

customer_review_foreign-R29C6M7Y7GVCPO.review:
The COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser is a total game-changer in my skincare routine! I have sensitive, combination skin, and it’s hard to find a cleanser that cleans without stripping my face. This one ticks all the boxes—it’s gentle, effective, and leaves my skin feeling refreshed without any tightness.

The low pH formula really helps maintain my skin’s balance, which is important to avoid breakouts and irritation. I also love that it contains tea tree oil and BHA, which keep my pores clear and calm any redness. Even though it’s called a “morning” cleanser, I use it both day and night, and it works beautifully every time.

The gel texture feels soothing, and it lathers just the right amount without being too foamy. Plus, the 150 ml bottle lasts a long time since a little bit goes a long way. It’s also fragrance-free, which is a bonus for those with sensitive skin or anyone avoiding strong scents.

If you’re looking for a reliable, gentle daily cleanser that works for all skin types—especially sensitive or acne-prone—this one is a must-try! I’ll definitely be repurchasing.

customer_review_foreign-R3TRSZ69S6TWOI.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 January 2019
customer_review_foreign-R3TRSZ69S6TWOI.review: I was a bit skeptical because of the horror stories I have seen on YouTube and other reviews but I’m really glad I went for it because this product doesnt irritate my skin or make me break out at all. In fact, every time I use it (I use it at night even though it says good morning which is totally fine) it leaves my skin with this slight glow, which is awesome! It doesn’t strip my skin at all like my other cleansers did which messed up my skins natural ph balance and actually CAUSED acne (Grrr skincare industry). If y’all haven’t looked at ph balanced products, you need to unless you want to have acne forever. If you destroy your skins natural moisture barrier and ph levels, you are essentially removing the fence your skin is trying to put up to protect itself which allows all kinds of bacteria to come in and have an acne party on your face. I’m using this as a part of my skincare regimen to help restore my skins natural barrier. The product has also helped fade my acne scars and assist with redness. Sometimes I will feel a zit brewing underneath my skin and it won’t even come out. I think this is due mainly to the tea tree oil and possibly the evening primrose oil in this. I honestly don’t care though because whichever ingredient is responsible for doing this is working. On that note, the product definitely smells like Tea Tree oil. Some people may think the scent smells like chemicals but this is really just the natural scent pure Tea Tree oil has. I personally like it but if the smell is not for you, it doesn’t linger at all. A little goes a long way with this product- it is very silky and suds up just slightly when you gently massage it into your skin. The product takes about a week to arrive at least to Texas (I think it must actually ship from Korea lol) but it was worth the wait. I would definitely recommend.

customer_review_foreign-RPSKVZ6F2DRUX.review:
I’ve been using the ANUA Heartleaf Quercetinol Pore Deep Cleansing Foam for a little while now, and overall, it’s been a pretty good experience. The first thing I noticed is its creamy texture and how much foam it creates – a little goes a long way, and the lather feels really soft and luxurious on the skin. It’s super gentle, which makes it great for daily use without stripping away moisture.

While my skin feels refreshed and smooth after using it, I’m not entirely sure if it’s doing a deep cleanse for my pores as it claims. I haven’t noticed a big difference in pore visibility or deep cleaning effects, but as a basic foamy cleanser, it works well for getting rid of surface impurities.

If you’re looking for a soft, gentle, and foamy cleanser that leaves your skin feeling clean and fresh, this one is worth trying. Just don’t expect a miracle when it comes to deep pore cleaning. Still, it’s a nice product that feels good on the skin!

Primero que nada quiero comentar que soy Fan número 1 de los skincare koreanos.
Tengo la piel mixta con tendencia a piel con textura, es decir, me salen, los llamados puntos blancos, que son poros obstruidos (no se ve nada blanco), de lo cuales hay que exfoliar.

FUNCIONALIDAD
"Dice" que es una limpiadora de poros a profundidad, para ser honesta no veo la diferencia a otras marca
Para mi sigue siendo una simple limpiadora igual que otra, hasta me parece mejor CeraVe y es muuuuucho más barato.

APARIENCIA
Tiene un olor suave a mentol (algo que me gusto)
Las primeras veces que lo use, era dificil de que saliera el producto y salia super compacto
Dias posteriores era algo entre liquido y solido, algo muy extraño y me pareció que eso no estaba bien y me empezó a causar desconfianza con el producto.
Así que antes de sacarlo, lo muevo un poco y sale como en la foto (pero imaginen nunca en la vida habia visto un jabón que le pasara eso)
Por otro lado al frotarlo en las manos da un espuma suave para luego colocarlo en el rostro, lo cual la sensación es sabrosa
No te deja la piel seca y es agradable.

Otro punto negativo, es que en la noches uso doble limpieza, primero el aceite y luego este jabon.
Y a pesar de que con cada uno tardo unos 40 segundos (cuenten el tiempo y verán que es bastante) y a veces me queda restos de maquillaje (ojo no uso maquillaje a prueba de agua), por lo que pongo más en duda su eficacia

CONCLUSIÓN.
creo que esos videos de tiktok e instagram donde dicen que este producto es milagros es falso, no me parece que haga bien su trabajo, según los beneficios que venden.
En definitiva no lo volvería a comprar, prefiero el CeraVe, cuyo precio es mucho menor, limpia mejor o igual pero además tiene niamina

customer_review_foreign-R1E6QPDWPXT2VO.review_title: Blowing my mind in real time!!!
customer_review_foreign-R1E6QPDWPXT2VO.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 19 February 2025
customer_review_foreign-R1E6QPDWPXT2VO.review:
I am VERY satisfied with this product so far. It has far exceeded my expectations of a face wash.

I am a 42yr old melanated woman and I smoke - that makes a difference in your skin. I live in the Midwest and it's February so cold frigid dry air right now. I notice that every winter my skin has a number of issues; dry patches, irritated acne, flakey, uneven tone/ashy, and fatigued looking. My face itches for no reason. I try a mixture of tea tree oil and moisturizer, nothing. I wash my face with Cetaphil as I have for over 2 decades, nothing. I finally accepted that it was time to change my routine and products. But I'm not a big consumer of makeup or skin care. I used Cetaphil and ponds for years and it has worked. My best friend recommended this and other products to cleanse, tone, tighten, even, and SPF protector. Reluctantly I ordered it. I received it on February 14th, today is the 18th and I already am overwhelmed with hope for this face cleanser. When I got it my face was irritated and itchy so I was a little scared to try it but within the time I've had it, the irritation has greatly deminished and my face doesn't itch as much or as long. My face looks clearer and brighter. I notice I had a little white pimple on my chin 2 days ago. Usually I would've popped it but I wanted to see the product work in real time and it has. I see it literally drying up and my skin isn't crusty or flakey. When I pat my face, I can see the skin that was exfoliated simply peel or wipe away. The effectiveness of this product is exactly what I read and what I needed!
Lastly, a little goes a long way so start out with a pea sized amount and if you need to go up(which you shouldn't) DO NOT ADD TOO MUCH! I paid less for this than Cetaphil, so the price makes me super happy and it will last just as long.

**Open your pores with hot water but rinse with cooler water. Pat dry.

text: Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser 1000ml, Face & Body, Suitable for All Skin Types, pH balanced, Soap and Fragrance Free, Contains Niacinamide, Dermatologically Tested.

Product Description.product_description: Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser is a mild, non-irritating soap free formulation that cleanses without stripping the skin of its natural protective oils or emollients. Dermatologically tested and designed specifically to work for all skin types, it is a simple, yet highly effective way to care for your skin.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
CETAPHIL DAILY FACIAL CLEANSER: Reinforces the skin barrier, balances skin and minimizes the appearance of pores
IDEAL FOR SENSITIVE, COMBINATION TO OILY SKIN: Clinically proven to deep clean by removing dirt, excess oils and impurities
DEVELOPED FOR EVEN THE MOST SENSITIVE SKIN: The non-comedogenic formula is free of parabens and sulfates
DEFENDS AGAINST 5 SIGNS OF SKIN SENSITIVITY: Dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrier
Dermatologist recommended

customer_review-R1Q1O4R59P7UHY.review:
This cleanser is a staple in my routine - super gentle, non-irritating, and keeps my skin feeling clean without drying it out. Perfect for both face and body, especially if you have sensitive skin.

What I liked:
✔ Fragrance-free and super gentle - great for sensitive skin.
✔ Doesn’t strip moisture but still cleans well.
✔ Works on both face and body, so it’s versatile.
✔ Huge 1L bottle lasts ages - good value for money.

What I didn’t like:
✘ Doesn’t foam, so it might feel different if you’re used to bubbly cleansers.
✘ Might not remove heavy makeup completely - best paired with a makeup remover.

If you need a no-fuss, gentle cleanser that works for daily use, this one’s a winner!

customer_review-R3SFSJVR163S27.review: Love the cleanser feels and smells great

customer_review-R19MM69ZBEI90K.review_title: Effective Cleansing without Stripping The Good Fats / Oils From Your skin.
customer_review-R19MM69ZBEI90K.review:
My Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser (1L) arrived on time and was in good condition (now, mostly used). Thank you Amazon (Au) for same day dispatch and Amazon Logistics for a fast, personal and safe delivery.

My face began to feel tight and hard as though it had been starched after using my usual cleanser, for some time. I knew that I needed to change to another more gentle cleanser. I tried using a little Sorbolene cream, but found that its oily / greasy character required extensive rinsing. Very inconvenient.

Luckily, Amazon had Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser on a deal. So I tried it. Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser has a smooth consistency. It doesn't feel oily or greasy (unlike sorbolene). Cetaphil has the viscosity of a lotion. It is easily spread over the skin, leaving it well coated. There is little wastage from dripping / falling off the skin like some other thicker cleansers. It can be readily washed or wiped off the skin.

Personally, l like to apply my cleanser to damp / wet skin. Upon use, I found Cetaphil to be a soothing, non irritating cleanser that left my face feeling clean and refreshed, without any skin tightness. What a relief from the worry of trying to find a suitable cleanser for a reasonable price.

An effective cleanser that leaves the natural oils / fats necessary for good skin health, whilst leaving the skin feeling clean.

text: Round Lab 1025 Dokdo Cleanser 150ml

Product Description.product_description: Round Lab 1025 Dokdo Cleanser is a creamy foaming cleanser to wash away makeup residue, impurities and airborne pollutants without stripping away moisture or disrupting your skin's protective barrier. Removes impurities and maintains moisture balance at the same time. Exfoliate with slighty acidic formula and unscented for sensitive skin. Dense, rich foamy texture with no scent. Formulated with Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramide NP, Glycerin, Panthenol, natural minerals, etc.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
Deep sea water of Ulleungdo Island - Maintenance of moisture balance by rich mineral ingredients
Low pH Cleanser - Maintenance of the skin balance with pH of 5.0-6.0
Cleansing of ultra-fine particulate matter - Neat cleansing of ultra-fine particulate matter remaining on the skin.
Cleansing power (cleansing effect) that erases imitations of ultra-fine particulate matter absorption.
Vegan friendly, Cruelty free

customer_review_foreign-R2S3ZXWD2BL79D.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 January 2025
customer_review_foreign-R2S3ZXWD2BL79D.review:
I have very sensitive skin that breaks out super easily and leans more on the dry side. It's been difficult to find a face wash I can use everyday that didn't dry out or irritate my face. From the top of my head I've tried the face shop foaming cleanser, cetaphil, olehenrikson, and kiehls (latest), and they all had varying problems. Kiehl's made my skin a bit better, but it wasn't something I was able to use everyday as it dried it out too much.

This is the only cleanser so far that I can use twice a day which doesn't leave my skin feeling overly tight, have dry spots, make my face red/itchy, or break out in skin colored bumps. My face normally can't stand using a face wash twice a day (or even washing twice a day), however it tolerates this one. It doesn't have a very distracting scent (its very slight) and cleans my skin adequately. It feels fresh, clean, and gentle. It's a bit hard to squeeze out of the bottle, but you don't need to use so much anyway and it lathers easily enough. I'm really happy I finally found something that doesn't make my skin angry.

customer_review_foreign-R3GHOS7UP01VNA.review:
The **ROUND LAB 1025 DOKDO Facial Cleanser** is a great option for anyone looking for a gentle yet effective daily cleanser. Here’s a review:

1. **Gentle Formula**: This facial cleanser is known for its mildness, making it suitable for various skin types, including sensitive skin. The formula is gentle enough for daily use, helping to remove dirt, oil, and impurities without stripping the skin or causing irritation.

2. **Key Ingredients**: The product features **Dokdo Water**, sourced from the pristine Dokdo Island in South Korea, which is rich in minerals and has soothing properties. This helps hydrate the skin while cleansing, leaving your face feeling fresh and balanced.

3. **Texture**: The cleanser has a smooth, slightly gel-like consistency that lathers well and feels light on the skin. It doesn’t leave any residue behind and doesn’t feel tight or dry after use, which is a big plus for those with dry or sensitive skin.

4. **Fragrance**: The product has a very subtle, fresh scent that isn’t overpowering, making it suitable for those who prefer fragrance-free or lightly scented skincare products.

5. **Packaging**: The 150 ml (5.07 fl.oz) size is compact and easy to use, with a convenient flip-top cap for dispensing the product. It's a good size for both daily use and travel.

**Overall**: The ROUND LAB 1025 DOKDO Facial Cleanser offers a refreshing, hydrating cleanse without being harsh on the skin. If you're looking for a gentle, mineral-rich cleanser that cleanses and nourishes, this one is worth trying!

customer_review_foreign-RNSCRMJIBHGJT.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 November 2024
customer_review_foreign-RNSCRMJIBHGJT.review:
This cleanser is meant to be non-drying, but it was still a bit drying on my skin. I have combo skin that's dry immediately after cleansing, but then gets oily in the t-zone throughout the day. I normally use non- or low-foaming cleansers with pH 5.5-ish as they're not drying after I finish cleansing.

Social media got me to try this cleanser since so many people were claiming it was foamy, but non-drying. While it is definitely very foamy, with a thick, velvety foam, it was drying on my skin.

I use it as a second cleanser after an oil cleanser and it seems to work well as a second cleanser. It has a faintest plasticky scent which does not bother me.

While it's not an ideal cleanser for my preference, I'll continue to use it up.

El producto que me ha llegado es auténtico a pesar de que la caja estaba algo abollada y abierta.

customer_review_foreign-R2Z58JIKKJC382.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 9 May 2024
customer_review_foreign-R2Z58JIKKJC382.review:
I am in LOVE with this cleanser! I usually use ROUND LAB's birch juice cleanser, but I wanted to try something new. This did not disappoint!

Packaging:
On point. Super cute, yet simple. There are instructions in English on the unicarton and Korean instructions on the actual product. The ingredients are clearly listed and the produst itself was sealed.

Use:
Pretty straightforward stuff, wet, lather, and rinse, right? That being said, this cleanser is a bit different. It DOES lather up, but with the addition of deep sea salt, the lather disappates quickly, (So yeah, that picture was taken rather QUICKLY) but of course, a little more water, and you're good to go! As with most ROUND LAB products, a little really does go a long way, so you really don't need to use a ton of product to get the good results! The formula is nice and soft, easy on, easy off and... it's hard to explain, but after rinsing, my face did "dry down" but it wasn't "dry-dry" (I hope that makes sense!)

Notes:
One thing I did notice that isn't a detractor or anything, is that the Sea Salt DOES act as a micro-exfoliant. So definitely be aware of that if you're sensitive to those sorts of things. I do believe it's safe to use for daily use, though, I won't personally be using it during my nighttime routine, just my morning one. (I'm also not a professional, so take that with a grain of Deep Sea Salt!)

Overall:
Round Lab has done it again! And for someone with Oily/Combo skin, this, paired with the rest of their line (and other K-beauty skin products) keep my face happy and clean!

text: COSRX Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser, 150ml, Pack of 1

customer_review-R24YK7HXABETMH.review:
Here we have the Salicylic acid daily gentle cleansers by Cosrx. (Korean brand)

This cleanser obvious key ingredient is 0.05% Salicylic Acid, Laurie Acid, Teatree leaf oil, Salicylic Alba Bark Water and Glycerine.

This is design to melt away impurities, it gently removes dirt, excess oil and product build up whilst replenishing moisture. This leaves your skin feeling soft, visibly clearer and boast your skins natural glow.

My experience- my skin type is dry/sensitive
This has a white thick gel like texture, also has a teatree/willow scent to it.
It is easy to lather up with water and form into foam texture.
I like to ensure my face is damp before I use this and and once again use this as a foam.
I generally gently rub this around my face for about 1 min before rising off. I find this allows time for the product to work.

With my skin type I can not use this daily, as I find it too stripping. I will gently use this once or twice a week depending on the condition of my skin.
( please note if this is drying your skin out and cause a break out, please stop and give it as rest as you are over using the product and breaking your skin barrier)

customer_review-R3TIGEOZ5HQM90.review: I use this several times a week. It’s fantastic, it keeps the blackheads and dry patches of skin on my face at bay. I use it on the back of my arms as well to help keep the KP under control

I exfoliate twice a week, night time only, and results were visible after the second week already, blackhead visibly reduced.
I know people who use this product every day and find it perfect for their skin type, personally I could not, my skin would burn, but so far this cleanser is delicate enough and I highly recommend it!
Every skin type have different results, only way is try it, but do not expect miracles please.
This cleanser is a must have on every skin routine!

customer_review-R1F5X4HTZG0M5H.review_title: Amazing Product, Improved My Skin Immensely
customer_review-R1F5X4HTZG0M5H.review:
I purchased this product as it was finally a facial cleanser with salicylic acid available in Australia for a reasonable price. I did not expect the near on instantaneous affects of this great cleanser.
I have struggled with moderate acne for the past few years, and have tried nearly every available drug store cleanser, toner, exfoliator etc. I had heard about the benefits of salicylic acid for acne prone skin, and looked into cleansers. Many were extremely expensive, or were only available in the US. I'm so glad I found this cleanser. I've now been using it for a month alongside my minocycline acne pills (lower level accutane like drug), and have found amazing benefits.
-reduced redness
-less swelling
-smaller breakouts
-less common breakouts
-less oily skin
-reduced appearance of sebaceous filaments
Would definitely recommend this cleanser if you struggle with oily skin and acne.

customer_review_foreign-R1QEAV56P1W7N2.review:
seit einigen monaten leide ich (21) unter einer etwas glänzenden und zu pickelchen neigenden haut, obwohl ich früher nie hautprobleme hatte. vermutlich stressbedingt.
zufälligerweise bin ich dann an eine probe dieses waschgels gelangt und es hat mir schon bei der ersten anwendung unglaublich gut gefallen. normalerweise spannt meine haut nach dem verwenden eines waschgels sehr und fühlt sich nicht gut an, was mich zum eincremen gezwungen hat und das hat das glänzen der haut nur verschlimmert. dadurch hab ich immer nur alle paar tage mal morgens ein waschgel verwendet.

das effaclar hingegen trocknet die haut überhaupt nicht aus, dank der ph-neutralen konsistenz. eincremen ist nach der anwendung nicht mehr zwingend erforderlich - die haut fühl sich frisch und sanft gereinigt an. ich habe es bis jetzt ungefähr 5-7 mal benutzt.
das wichtigste - und ich kann absolut nicht verstehen, wie einige damen und herren das verneinen können! - ich habe seit der ersten anwendung keine glänzende haut mehr. auch die pickelchen sind fast verschwunden. morgens seh ich schon noch mal ein kleines rotes pünktchen im spiegel, aber als pickel kann man das nicht bezeichnen.

ich kann es ABSOLUT jedem empfehlen, der ebenfalls unter einer etwas fettigen (postpubertären) haut leidet! das geld ist es auf jeden fall wert! :-)

PS: ich benutze dazu die gesichtsreinigungsbürste von olaz. ebenfalls wärmestens zu empfehlen!

customer_review_foreign-R1JPWDSIGG9MWZ.reviewer_name: Title: Illuminating Elegance with elf Halo Glow: Not Ideal for Oily Skin While the elf Halo Glow highlighting palette boasts captivating radiance and versatile application, it falls short for those with oily skin types. As an individual navigating the challenges of oily skin, I found that this otherwise remarkable palette presented some drawbacks worth noting. Despite its enchanting range of shades and seamless blending capabilities, the luminous finish of the elf Halo Glow palette tends to accentuate the natural shine of oily skin, rather than providing a desired glow. Throughout the day, I noticed that the shimmer particles intensified the appearance of oiliness, resulting in a less-than-desirable finish. Additionally, the longevity of the highlighter proved to be an issue for oily skin. Despite initial promises of staying power, the product struggled to maintain its luminosity in the presence of excess oil, often requiring frequent touch-ups to restore its radiance. While the packaging remains sleek and travel-friendly, and the shade range caters to various skin tones, these attributes may not outweigh the challenges faced by those with oily skin. In conclusion, while the elf Halo Glow highlighting palette may be a dream for some, it may not be the ideal choice for individuals with oily skin. For those seeking a luminous finish without exacerbating oiliness, alternative options may better suit their needs.
customer_review_foreign-R1JPWDSIGG9MWZ.review:
La Roche-Posay's face wash stands out as a refreshing and gentle option for daily skincare routines. Having incorporated it into my regimen, I've found several aspects of the product to be commendable.

Firstly, its gentle formulation is a standout feature. Suitable for sensitive skin, it cleanses effectively without causing irritation or dryness, making it a reliable choice for daily use. The absence of harsh ingredients ensures a soothing experience, particularly for those prone to sensitivity or redness.

Moreover, the face wash's effectiveness in removing impurities and excess oil is noteworthy. Despite its mild nature, it lathers well and effectively cleanses the skin without stripping away its natural moisture barrier. This leaves the skin feeling clean, refreshed, and balanced after each use.

Additionally, the inclusion of La Roche-Posay's signature Thermal Spring Water adds an extra layer of hydration and comfort to the cleansing experience. This unique ingredient helps to soothe and soften the skin, contributing to a refreshed and revitalized complexion.

The packaging is practical and user-friendly, with a convenient pump dispenser that ensures easy and mess-free application. The product's dermatologist-tested and fragrance-free formula further adds to its appeal, making it suitable for a wide range of skin types, including those with sensitivities or allergies.

However, while the face wash excels in cleansing and soothing the skin, it may not be the most effective option for removing heavy makeup or waterproof products. In such cases, a double cleanse or additional makeup remover may be necessary.

In summary, La Roche-Posay's face wash is a reliable and gentle cleanser that effectively cleanses the skin without compromising its delicate balance. Suitable for daily use, it offers a refreshing and soothing experience, making it a staple in any skincare routine.

customer_review_foreign-RD8KN42G16TE2.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 November 2017
customer_review_foreign-RD8KN42G16TE2.review:
I have combination to oily skin. Before using La Roche Posay, I had bumps all over my forehead because of my bangs (which I've had for over 6 years) and I got so disgusted looking at my forehead I needed to do something about it and invest in a good cleanser that was inexpensive. I used to use St. Ives, Clean and Clear, and Neutrogena then my friend let me try some of her La Roche Posay products and I absolutely loved it and bought this cleanser ASAP.

After using this cleanser for about two weeks I noticed a difference in my skin and it was clearing up (especially my forehead). I was happy with my purchase. It's super gentle on my sensitive skin and the product lasts a long time. After three months of using this product I found out what works for me.

Some tips and tricks with using this product
- Know your skin type!!!
- Remove any makeup before washing your face
- rinse your face with warm water and wash the cleanser off with warm water. After washing, splash your face with COLD water
- Make sure to activate the product in your hands before applying it on the face, don't apply it directly after taking the product out
- wash your face for a sold minute and a half to ensure a good cleansing
- ALWAYS MOISTURIZE RIGHT AFTER CLEANSING OR CONTINUE WITH YOUR SKIN CARE ROUTINE
- If you're more combo than oily, only use this cleanser once a day or else it will dry our your skin. If you want to cleanse twice a day, invest in a lighter formula of this cleanser.

If you don't moisturize right after or continue with your skin care routine, you won't notice a visible difference. Always hydrate the skin after cleansing. If you're looking for immediate results, this might not be your product. For me with most products, I notice a difference after consistent uses up to two weeks. Patience is key with trying new skin care products because your skin needs to get used to what you're putting on it. Knowing your skin type helps a lot too with finding cleansers and products that will suit your skin needs.

Overall, this cleanser from La Roche Posay works for me and I absolutely love the results from it. If you're not into scents or smells, this product has a very light scent. Not fruity, or strong just smells refreshing.

customer_review_foreign-RFUI4VYS8YPGJ.review:
MEINE KLEINE GESCHICHTE, FÜR DIE, DIE ES INTERESSIERT:

Ich leide seit ungefähr meinem 11ten Lebensjahr an unreine Haut. Mein Rücken, Dekolleté und mein Gesicht waren total fettig und mit vielen Pickeln bedeckt. Leider war ich jung und naiv und durch sehr mangelnder Hygiene habe ich mich nicht weiter darum gekümmert, meine Mutter leider auch nicht. Im Alter von 16 Jahren habe ich mir mehr Gedanken darüber gemacht und mal geschaut welchen Hauttyp ich doch entspreche. Leider habe ich irgendwie immer auf trockene Haut getippt dabei war das total falsch. Ich habe mir dementsprechend auch Produkte für trockene oder Mischhaut gekauft, dies führte natürlich nur dazu das sich meine Haut extrem austrocknete und ich anschließend mehr Talg produziert habe, meine Poren sich verstopft haben und ich natürlich noch mehr Pickel bekam. Also wie ihr seht, sehr dumm war ich schon.
Ich habe massig viele Produkte aus Drogeriemärkten probiert und alle sind irgendwie scheiße, vor allem gibt es nur Produkte für trockene, sehr trockene oder Mischhaut. Ich habe mich mal anschließend im Internet schlau gemacht und festgestellt das ich an fettiger Haut leide, dementsprechend machte ich mich auf die Suche nach Produkten.

ÜBER DAS PRODUKT:

Ich bin auf La Roche-Posay gestoßen und mir mal einiges darüber durchgelesen. Es überzeugte mich schon sehr also habe ich mir das Reinigungsgel, eine Creme, ein Peeling und ein Anti-Pickelmale Creme gekauft. Man muss schon sagen es ging schon etwas (ca. 80€) aufs Geld aber ich versichere euch es hat sich extrem gelohnt. Ich besitze die Produkte seit einer Woche und ich sehe Tag für Tag immer mehr unterschied. Klar, seine Zeit braucht es immer, aber man merkt in der Zeit ein recht gutes Ergebnis. Ich habe wie gesagt mit vielen Produkten zu tun gehabt und es verschlimmerte meistens nur das Ergebnis. Es ist sehr angenehm, es riecht gut und die Haut fettet nicht nach, ich verwende das Gel morgens und abends und anschließend auch die Anti-Pickelmal Creme.

MEIN KLEINER TIPP:

Ich bin sehr überzeugt und kann es wirklich weiter empfehlen wer an fettige/ölige Haut mit Mitessern und Pickeln leidet.
Schaut bitte erst nach, welcher Hauttyp ihr seit bevor ihr euch die falschen Produkte zulegt. Wenn euch dementsprechend nichts Hilft dann ist ein Besuch beim Hautsarzt notwendig, vor allem bei Personen die unter Akne leidet, lasst es euch regelmäßig untersuchen, es ist nicht damit zu Spaßen und achtet darauf wie ihr euch ernährt, also ist ein McDonalds besuch besser zu vermeiden, oder Chips und sonstige Süßigkeiten.

Después del verano pasado, tuve un brote de acné hormonal. Estaba desesperada, cuando se me secaban los granitos, me salían otros y era un no parar. Siempre he usado esta marca y me ha dado muy buenos resultados, sobre todo para unificar cicatrices. Así que aprovechando que ya tenía el Effaclar Duo [+], me cogí este limpiador para completar el tratamiento.
Lo uso incluso para desmaquillarme, ya que no irrita los ojos (con cuidado, claro) y a diario. Diría que la duración del bote podría ser de 10-12 meses sin ningún tipo de problema.
Los resultados:
La primera foto que pongo es de antes del tratamiento, la segunda es de unos 6 meses después. Prácticamente no tengo ninguna cicatriz (no llevo maquillaje en las fotos), y el brote ha desaparecido.
Lo recomiendo muchísimo, junto a la hidratante que he comentado antes.

text: Paula's Choice CLEAR Pore Normalizing Cleanser, Salicylic Acid Face Wash for Blemishes, Blackheads, Large Pores & Redness, 177 mL

Product Description.product_description: CLEAR Pore Normalizing Cleanser isn’t like most other skin cleansers; it is completely non-irritating and won’t cause dryness or flaking. This cleansing gel actually has a silky feel that works quickly to remove excess oil and debris that can clog pores. It gently removes excess oil, debris, and impurities, leaving skin feeling clean, smooth, and refreshed with visibly improved clarity. All Paula’s Choice products are 100% fragrance free, non-irritating, and never tested on animals.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
NON-IRRITATING CLEANSING: This cleanser for blemish-prone skin removes pore-clogging impurities, excess oil & makeup without stripping or dryness.
BLEMISH-FIGHTING BHA: A gentle concentration of beta hydroxy acid (salicylic acid) helps decongest & minimise large, clogged pores.
CONTROL OIL & REDNESS: Soothing, moisture-replenishing ingredients help balance hydration, excess oil & redness while leaving skin smooth, comfortable & clear.
CLEAN, COMFORTABLE & CLEAR: This powerful formula works well for normal, oily, combination, dry & blemish-prone skin types.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes science-backed products that work. No fragrance, no fluff. Just effective, cruelty-free formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to blemishes.

customer_review_foreign-R3IZHBVTTTQ7A6.review:
Als langjähriger Kunde von Paula's Choice bin ich erneut begeistert von diesem hervorragenden Reinigungsgel. Der CLEAR Gesichtsreiniger ist ein wahrer Allrounder, der nicht nur gründlich Make-up entfernt, sondern auch gegen Unreinheiten vorgeht und überschüssigen Talg reduziert.

Das Beste an diesem Produkt ist jedoch, dass es sanft zur Haut ist und gleichzeitig sehr wirksam gegen Pickel und andere Unreinheiten ist. Der enthaltene Wirkstoff Salicylsäure ist ein echtes Wundermittel gegen Mitesser und andere Hautprobleme. Das Reinigungsgel hinterlässt meine Haut erfrischt und gepflegt, ohne dass es sich trocken oder gereizt anfühlt.

Besonders beeindruckt hat mich die Wirkung von Panthenol / Vitamin B5. Es speichert Feuchtigkeit und verbessert das Erscheinungsbild meiner Haut deutlich. Ich habe bemerkt, dass meine Haut sich glatter und strahlender anfühlt, seit ich diesen Reiniger benutze.

Die Anwendung ist sehr einfach und schnell. Ich befeuchte mein Gesicht mit lauwarmem Wasser und verteile dann eine haselnussgroße Menge des Reinigers auf meinen Fingerspitzen. Ich massiere ihn sanft mit kreisenden Bewegungen in mein Gesicht und um die Augen herum ein, bevor ich ihn gründlich abwasche.

Das Beste an diesem Reiniger ist, dass er für alle Hauttypen geeignet ist, auch für empfindliche und trockene Haut. Das Gel enthält keine scharfen Inhaltsstoffe und ist wasserlöslich. Es trocknet meine Haut nicht aus und eignet sich perfekt für die Gesichtsreinigung unter der Dusche oder in der Badewanne.

Ich bin auch sehr glücklich darüber, dass alle Produkte von Paula's Choice parfümfrei sind und niemals an Tieren getestet werden. Das gibt mir ein gutes Gefühl und ich kann die Produkte mit gutem Gewissen verwenden.

Zusammenfassend kann ich nur sagen, dass der CLEAR Gesichtsreiniger von Paula's Choice ein absoluter Top-Produkt ist. Er ist effektiv, sanft zur Haut und für alle Hauttypen geeignet. Ich kann ihn jedem empfehlen, der nach einem zuverlässigen Reiniger sucht, der Unreinheiten und Pickel bekämpft und gleichzeitig die Haut pflegt.

text: CeraVe Blemish Control Cleanser Gel Face Wash For Blackheads, Blocked Pores & Acne-prone Skin, 2% Salicylic Acid + Niacinamide + Purifying Clay + Ceramides, Lightweight + Oil-Absorbing, 236ml

Product Description.product_description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Blemish Control Face Wash is formulated with 2% salicylic acid to target blemishes and visibly reduce blackheads. Purifying clay improves the appearance of pores. Formulated with Oil-Absorbing Technology, in a refreshing gel-to-foam texture, the CeraVe cleanser for acne-prone skin cleans skin and unclogs pores, targeting blemishes and helping to prevent future breakouts, while maintaining the skin moisture barrier with 3 essential ceramides.. Formulated with a powerful BHA, this salicylic acid cleanser for acne-prone skin makes an effective exfoliator that helps remove dead skin cells and excess sebum, visibly reducing blackheads and the appearance of pores. This 3 chemical exfoliant is gentle on skin prone to blemishes. Blemish Control Cleanser with Salicylic Acid: Helps visibly reduce blemishes and the appearance of pores and blackheads from the skin's surface, while helping to prevent future breakouts. Lightweight Texture: Unique clear gel formula transforms into a light, foaming blemish control face wash to gently remove dirt and excess oil from skin's surface without leaving skin feeling stripped of moisture. Oil-Absorbing: Purifying Clay helps to absorb excess oil and visibly reduce clogged pores while niacinamide comforts skin. Essential Ceramides: This effective cleanser for blemish-prone skin contains three essential ceramides to hydrate and help support the skin moisture barrier. Gentle On Skin: Fragrance free, paraben free, non-comedogenic, pH-balanced. Type of Skin: The CeraVe Blemish Control Cleanser is formulated for oily skin prone to mild acne. Target blemishes and visibly reduce the appearance of pores and blackheads for efficacious results.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
CeraVe Blemish Control Face Wash is formulated with 2% salicylic acid to target blemishes and visibly reduce blackheads. Purifying clay improves the appearance of pores.
Blemish Control Cleanser with Salicylic Acid: Helps visibly reduce blemishes and the appearance of pores and blackheads from the skin's surface, while helping to prevent future breakouts.
The CeraVe Blemish Control Cleanser is formulated for oily skin prone to mild acne. Target blemishes and visibly reduce the appearance of pores and blackheads for efficacious results.
Gentle On Skin: Fragrance free, paraben free, non-comedogenic, pH-balanced.
Developed with dermatologists and #1 Dermatologist Recommended Skincare Brand in the US* Disclaimer: *IQVIA ProVoice Survey, US Dermatologists, 38 skincare categories, rolling 12 months to October 2023.

customer_review_foreign-R1O8MZX7Y2Q2N0.review_title: Un gel moussant efficace pour une peau purifiée et nette !
customer_review_foreign-R1O8MZX7Y2Q2N0.review:
Le gel moussant anti-imperfections de CeraVe est devenu incontournable dans ma routine de soins. Dès la première utilisation, j'ai remarqué à quel point ce produit nettoie en profondeur. Après chaque application, ma peau se sent incroyablement propre et fraîche, sans être desséchée, ce qui est souvent le cas avec d'autres produits pour peaux à tendance acnéique.

L'un des points forts de ce gel moussant est sa formule équilibrée, enrichie en acide salicylique, argile blanche, céramides et niacinamide. Ces ingrédients ciblent les imperfections tout en respectant l'intégrité de la peau. J'ai noté une réduction visible des imperfections après quelques semaines d'utilisation régulière.

Ce que j'apprécie également, c'est son odeur neutre. Contrairement à certains produits similaires qui peuvent être trop parfumés ou chimiques, ce gel moussant ne laisse aucune odeur persistante, ce qui le rend agréable à utiliser au quotidien.

La texture du gel mousse bien sans être excessive, et il se rince facilement, laissant une sensation de propreté durable. Je recommande vivement ce produit à toutes celles et ceux qui cherchent à purifier leur peau tout en réduisant les imperfections, sans agresser leur épiderme.

En résumé, ce gel moussant de CeraVe est un excellent choix pour les peaux à tendance acnéique. Il offre un nettoyage en profondeur, une sensation de fraîcheur et une efficacité visible sur les imperfections.

customer_review_foreign-RZONFTQOYM7FQ.review:

Contiene acido salicilico, che aiuta a ridurre le imperfezioni nel tempo
Non secca la pelle grazie ai ceramidi e alla niacinamideTexture leggera, fa una schiuma delicata e si risciacqua facilmenteNon ha un odore forte, il che è un grande punto a favore per me

customer_review_foreign-R1VJKXBSQN4TKX.review_title: Very good at removing oils and reducing number of spots
customer_review_foreign-R1VJKXBSQN4TKX.review_date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 April 2025
customer_review_foreign-R1VJKXBSQN4TKX.review:
The bottle itself allows you to lock the pump, making it very nice to store without worrying about spills and incredible easy to use. A 236ml originally felt small but after using it twice daily for a few weeks, the bottle is still more than half full - an incredible deal for the price it's set at. This means it'll surely last a while.

In terms of effectiveness, the product itself works wonders even after a single use. It leaves the skin feeling and looking soft and helps to deal with possibly embarrassing spots and clogged pores. In my case, it effectively removed excess oils and made the skin look great. Of course, it doesn't entirely get rid of spots - it's not magic! However, in my case, it has helped to at least reduce the amount of them or conceal them a bit.

For my oily skin, it removed the oils and made the skin feel soft rather than moisturise but this may be different on different types of skin.

customer_review_foreign-R1K39DTBPA9YVE.review:
ch benutze das CeraVe Reinigungsprodukt jetzt schon seit einiger Zeit, und ich muss sagen, dass ich wirklich sehr zufrieden damit bin. Am Anfang war ich etwas skeptisch, weil ich schon viele Produkte ausprobiert habe, die nicht wirklich geholfen haben. Aber CeraVe hat mich wirklich überrascht! Nach nur wenigen Wochen habe ich gemerkt, dass meine Haut viel reiner geworden ist und die Pickel nach und nach verschwunden sind. Besonders beeindruckt hat mich, dass das Produkt meine Haut überhaupt nicht austrocknet – im Gegenteil, sie fühlt sich nach der Anwendung immer gut mit Feuchtigkeit versorgt und angenehm weich an. Es hinterlässt auch kein spannendes Gefühl auf der Haut, was mir bei anderen Produkten oft passiert ist.

Ein weiterer großer Vorteil ist der Preis. CeraVe ist im Vergleich zu vielen anderen Produkten auf dem Markt ziemlich erschwinglich, und das, obwohl es wirklich eine hohe Qualität bietet. Man hat also das Gefühl, ein Premium-Produkt zu benutzen, ohne dafür ein Vermögen ausgeben zu müssen. Auch die Anwendung ist sehr einfach: Die Konsistenz ist angenehm, es lässt sich gut auftragen und auch leicht wieder abwaschen. Der Geruch ist zudem sehr dezent, was ich persönlich sehr angenehm finde, weil ich starke Parfümierungen im Gesicht nicht mag. Alles in allem bin ich wirklich begeistert von CeraVe und werde es auf jeden Fall weiterhin verwenden. Es hat meine Hautpflege-Routine wirklich auf ein neues Level gehoben und ich kann es jedem empfehlen, der mit unreiner Haut oder Trockenheit zu kämpfen hat!

Desde que empecé a usar el CeraVe Gel Limpiador Control Imperfecciones, mi piel ha mejorado notablemente. Este gel limpiador está especialmente formulado para pieles con tendencia acneica y grasa, y puedo decir que ha sido una excelente adición a mi rutina de cuidado facial. El gel contiene ácido salicílico, que ayuda a reducir los brotes de acné, minimizar los puntos negros y limpiar los poros en profundidad. Lo mejor es que, aunque es efectivo, no reseca la piel como otros productos con ácido salicílico que he probado.

La textura del gel es suave y agradable, y no deja sensación pegajosa ni tirante después de usarlo. Al ser sin fragancia y con una fórmula no comedogénica, es ideal para pieles sensibles. Después de unas semanas de uso, he notado que los brotes de acné son menos frecuentes y mi piel se ve más equilibrada y suave. Además, el tamaño de 236 ml es perfecto, ya que dura bastante tiempo y me proporciona un buen rendimiento por el precio. Si buscas un limpiador eficaz, suave y accesible para controlar el acné y mejorar la textura de la piel, el CeraVe Gel Limpiador Control Imperfecciones es una excelente opción. ¡Lo recomiendo totalmente!

customer_review_foreign-R36TZ2BZO2FZ5N.review:
La espuma limpiadora antiacné de CeraVe es un producto increíblemente efectivo para quienes buscan combatir el acné y las imperfecciones mientras cuidan su piel grasa. Su fórmula contiene ingredientes clave como el ácido salicílico, que ayuda a exfoliar suavemente, desobstruir los poros y reducir la aparición de brotes.

Lo que realmente destaca es su capacidad para limpiar profundamente sin resecar, gracias a las ceramidas y el niacinamida, que restauran la barrera cutánea y calman la piel. La textura espumosa es ligera y fácil de aplicar, dejando una sensación de frescura y limpieza después de cada uso.

Con 236 ml, el tamaño es perfecto para uso diario, y los resultados son visibles con el tiempo: menos imperfecciones, menos brillo y una piel más equilibrada. Si tienes piel grasa y buscas un limpiador confiable y dermatológicamente recomendado, este de CeraVe es una excelente elección. ¡Altamente recomendado!

customer_review_foreign-RE7CL5QNQP1NB.review_title: Limpidor en profundidad y sin irritación
customer_review_foreign-RE7CL5QNQP1NB.review:
Llevo un tiempo usando el CeraVe Blemish Control Cleanser y honestamente, ha sido un cambio positivo en mi rutina de cuidado de la piel. Como alguien que lucha con las imperfecciones y el exceso de grasa, siempre estoy buscando productos que mantengan mi piel limpia sin resecarla. Este limpiador me ha sorprendido gratamente, y aquí explico por qué.

Limpieza Profunda y Suave
Algo que me ha encantado de este producto es cómo consigue una limpieza profunda sin dejar la piel seca o tirante. He probado otros limpiadores para el acné, pero muchos de ellos suelen ser bastante agresivos. En cambio, el limpiador de CeraVe logra limpiar los poros y controlar el sebo sin causar irritación. Después de usarlo, siento la piel fresca y limpia, pero no tengo esa sensación incómoda de sequedad extrema. Es un equilibrio difícil de encontrar en productos para pieles acneicas, y aquí creo que han acertado.

Ingredientes Activos y sus Beneficios
Este limpiador tiene una combinación de ingredientes que funciona muy bien. Uno de los principales es el ácido salicílico, que es ideal para desobstruir los poros y prevenir nuevos brotes. Al ser un exfoliante químico, no necesito usar scrubs físicos que pueden ser demasiado abrasivos. Siento que el ácido salicílico me ayuda a mantener la piel limpia y con menos puntos negros, algo que siempre es un reto.

Además, tiene niacinamida, que es un ingrediente que me gusta mucho. La niacinamida ayuda a calmar la piel y a reducir el enrojecimiento, lo que es perfecto si tienes acné y la piel un poco irritada. También regula el exceso de grasa, así que he notado que mi piel está menos brillante a lo largo del día.

Finalmente, algo que me parece un punto fuerte son las ceramidas. Son lípidos que ayudan a mantener la barrera de la piel intacta, y esto es crucial en productos de limpieza. Muchas veces, los productos para el acné pueden dañar la barrera cutánea y dejar la piel más vulnerable, pero gracias a las ceramidas, noto que este limpiador es más respetuoso y mantiene mi piel equilibrada.

Textura y Sensación al Usarlo
La textura es otro aspecto que me gusta. Es un gel que al frotarlo en el rostro se convierte en una espuma ligera. No es demasiado espumoso, lo cual aprecio porque siento que se distribuye bien sin ser abrasivo. Después de enjuagarlo, noto que mi piel se siente muy fresca y con una limpieza profunda, pero sin esa sensación tirante que algunos limpiadores dejan.

Resultados que He Notado
Con el uso regular, he visto mejoras en mi piel. Los brotes son menos frecuentes y cuando aparecen, son menos severos. También siento que la textura de mi piel es más suave y uniforme, probablemente por el efecto de la exfoliación química del ácido salicílico. Me gusta que es un producto que puedo usar todos los días sin preocuparme de que me reseque o irrite la piel.

Ideal para Mi Tipo de Piel
Aunque este limpiador está diseñado para pieles con tendencia acneica, creo que funciona bien para varios tipos de piel, especialmente si tienes piel mixta o grasa. Mi piel es mixta y suelo tener problemas de exceso de grasa en la zona T, pero con este limpiador noto que el control de sebo es efectivo. Incluso si tienes piel sensible, creo que funcionaría bien porque es bastante suave y tiene ingredientes calmantes.

Relación Calidad-Precio
En cuanto a la cantidad, el envase trae 236 ml, lo cual me parece bastante generoso. Necesito muy poco producto cada vez que lo uso, así que una botella dura bastante. Considerando la calidad de los ingredientes y los resultados que obtengo, creo que tiene una excelente relación calidad-precio. Además, CeraVe es una marca conocida por sus fórmulas efectivas y suaves, así que tengo confianza en sus productos.

customer_review_foreign-R229ERE4ESZAJ.review:
Ho iniziato a usare questo detergente CeraVe circa due settimane fa, sperando di migliorare la mia pelle che tende a essere grassa con qualche imperfezione qua e là. Mi è piaciuto subito il fatto che non avesse profumi forti o fastidiosi: è molto delicato sulla pelle, anche se contiene acido salicilico.

Dopo i primi giorni, ho notato che la pelle sembrava più pulita e meno lucida, soprattutto nella zona T. Non fa miracoli immediati (non aspettatevi di svegliarvi con la pelle perfetta da un giorno all’altro), ma con un uso costante si vedono dei miglioramenti. Mi sembra che i pori siano meno evidenti e che le imperfezioni si asciughino più in fretta.

La texture è interessante: un gel che non fa molta schiuma, ma che si risciacqua facilmente senza lasciare residui. E l’argilla purificante è un bel tocco, perché non secca la pelle come pensavo, cosa che apprezzo molto dato che la mia pelle è mista e a volte sensibile.

L’unica cosa è che, se lo usi troppo spesso o senza idratare bene dopo, può lasciare la pelle un po’ tirata. Io lo uso una volta al giorno, la sera, e finora sta andando benissimo.

Punti a favore:
• Controlla bene la lucidità e lascia la pelle pulita.
• Non irrita, nonostante gli attivi presenti.
• Perfetto per pelli miste o grasse.

Punti da migliorare:
• La confezione è un po’ piccola per il prezzo, ma ne basta poco.
• Meglio usarlo insieme a una buona crema idratante per evitare secchezza.

In generale, è un prodotto che consiglio a chi vuole prendersi cura della pelle senza complicarsi troppo la vita. Basta avere un po’ di pazienza per vedere i risultati!

customer_review_foreign-R1P4JX4DC0YFF9.review_title: Encore une fois un révolution de la marque CeraVe !
customer_review_foreign-R1P4JX4DC0YFF9.review:
J'ai récemment eu l'occasion de tester ce produit pour moi et je suis vraiment impressionné par ses résultats !
Avec ses ingrédients clés tels que l'Acide Salicylique, l'Argile Blanche, la Niacinamide, l'Acide Hyaluronique et les 3 Céramides Essentiels, il offre tout ce que je cherchais pour un lavant visage !

Tout d'abord, l'Acide Salicylique agit en douceur pour exfolier et lisser la peau, tout en désobstruant les pores. L'Argile Blanche purifie efficacement la peau et aide à réduire l'excès de sébum, ce qui est idéal pour les personnes aux prises avec des problèmes d'acné.
La présence de Niacinamide dans ce produit est vraiment apprécié, car il offre une action anti-inflammatoire qui apaise la peau et réduit les rougeurs (contrairement à certaines marques avec du savon agressif). De plus, l'Acide Hyaluronique hydrate en profondeur, laissant la peau douce et souple (plus de peau asséché !).

Ce qui m'a particulièrement plu, c'est que ce produit parvient à enlever les impuretés de la peau sans l'assécher. Cela est essentiel pour prévenir l'apparition de boutons et maintenir un équilibre optimal de l'hydratation cutanée. Je recommande toutefois de l'utiliser une fois à deux fois par jour pour de meilleurs résultats, car une trop forte utilisation produit l'effet inverse ! (Ce n'est pas en nettoyant la peau plusieurs fois par jour que vous allez réduire l'acné, il faut la nettoyer le matin et le soir - pour ma part uniquement le soir car je n'ai pas une peau très grasse)

Finalement, ce qui m'a séduit dans ce produit c'est de pouvoir trouver tout ce qu'on a besoin pour limiter l'acné sans pour autant devoir acheter plein de produit sans skincare conseillé. Je n'en pouvais plus d'avoir plusieurs produits et j'ai enfin trouvé ce qui me correspondait. Ne nettoyer plus votre peau avec du savon de Marseille en espérant enlever le sébum, prenez plutôt ce savon :)

Produktbeschreibung:
Die CeraVe Porentiefe Reinigung für das Gesicht ist eine hochwertige Reinigungslotion, die speziell entwickelt wurde, um die Haut gründlich zu reinigen, ohne sie auszutrocknen. Diese Reinigungslotion eignet sich für alle Hauttypen, einschließlich empfindlicher Haut, und bietet eine effektive Lösung zur Entfernung von Schmutz, überschüssigem Öl und Make-up.

Formulierung und Inhaltsstoffe:
CeraVe setzt auf eine sanfte, aber effektive Formulierung. Die Reinigungslotion enthält drei essenzielle Ceramide (1, 3 und 6-II), die die Hautbarriere unterstützen und helfen, Feuchtigkeit zu bewahren. Hyaluronsäure ist ein weiterer wichtiger Inhaltsstoff, der die Haut hydratisiert und geschmeidig hält. Die nicht-komedogene und parfümfreie Formulierung sorgt dafür, dass die Poren nicht verstopfen und die Haut nicht irritiert wird.

Anwendung und Ergebnisse:
Die Anwendung der CeraVe Porentiefe Reinigung ist einfach und angenehm. Ein kleiner Pumpstoß der Lotion reicht aus, um das Gesicht gründlich zu reinigen. Die Lotion lässt sich leicht auftragen und bildet einen sanften Schaum, der Schmutz und Öl effektiv entfernt. Nach dem Abspülen fühlt sich die Haut sauber, erfrischt und nicht gespannt an.

Regelmäßige Anwendung der Reinigungslotion führt zu sichtbaren Ergebnissen. Die Haut wirkt klarer und glatter, und das Hautbild insgesamt verbessert sich. Da die Formulierung sanft ist, eignet sie sich auch für die tägliche Anwendung, ohne die Haut zu reizen oder auszutrocknen.

Verpackung und Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis:
Die CeraVe Porentiefe Reinigung kommt in einer praktischen Pumpflasche, die eine hygienische und einfache Dosierung ermöglicht. Das Produkt ist in verschiedenen Größen erhältlich, was es flexibel für unterschiedliche Bedürfnisse macht. In Bezug auf das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis bietet diese Reinigungslotion eine hervorragende Qualität zu einem vernünftigen Preis, besonders angesichts der hochwertigen Inhaltsstoffe und der positiven Ergebnisse.

Fazit:
Die CeraVe Porentiefe Reinigung für das Gesicht ist eine ausgezeichnete Wahl für alle, die eine effektive und sanfte Reinigungsmethode suchen. Mit ihrer durchdachten Formulierung, den pflegenden Inhaltsstoffen und der benutzerfreundlichen Verpackung überzeugt sie auf ganzer Linie. Diese Reinigungslotion unterstützt die Hautgesundheit und sorgt für ein klares, erfrischtes Hautbild, ohne die natürliche Feuchtigkeitsbarriere der Haut zu stören. Eine klare Empfehlung für alle Hauttypen, besonders für diejenigen, die zu empfindlicher Haut neigen.

text: Sukin Foaming Facial Cleanser, Signature, 125 ml

Product Description.product_description: Sukin Signature Foaming Facial Cleanser is perfect for a normal to oily skin type, our Facial Foaming Cleanser is a non-drying, gentle gel cleanser that purifies the skin, without stripping it of its natural oils. Not only does it work to remove makeup, daily dirt build up and excess oils, it also helps to soothe and tighten the skin with a natural blend of Chamomile, Aloe Vera, Green Tea and Witch Hazel- win. Evening Primrose and our favorite Rosehip Oil is also added, to provide light hydration, leaving your skin soft and touchable.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
Non-drying, gentle gel cleanser
Perfect for a normal to oily skin type
Purifies the skin, without stripping it of its natural oils
Removes makeup, daily dirt build up and excess oils
Helps to soothe and tighten the skin

customer_review_foreign-R3MRPX7UWGJWMT.review: This is my first ever Amazon review but I just had to write it because Sukin deserves all the positive reviews. I have been using Sukin products for around two years now so I've really given them the test of time. I use three products religiously: the Micellar Cleansing Water, the signature Facial Moisturiser, and this foaming facial cleanser. They are all equally excellent and are the only skincare products I use at all. Throughout my life I have been prone to breakouts and extremely sensitive skin. If I ever try and switch out my skincare and try other products, it immediately breaks out. Sukin is the only brand that my skin has ever responded well to, and my skin has never become 'bored' of it so to speak, it has produced consistently good results for the entire two years I have been using it. This cleanser removes makeup SO well, I just use it in the shower and scrub it onto a face full of makeup and it removes EVERYTHING, including stubborn mascara and eyeliner - just make sure you rub it in and make it nice and foamy. It is honestly amazing and leaves my skin feeling fresh, clean and healthy. I would recommend all Sukin products always.

customer_review_foreign-R1S8G66ATMGOMM.review_date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 April 2024
customer_review_foreign-R1S8G66ATMGOMM.review:
The Sukin Foaming Facial Cleanser provides a refreshing and gentle cleansing experience. Initially, I enjoyed using it daily, appreciating its ability to effectively remove dirt and impurities without drying out my skin as much as some cleansers do.

However, only a day after my first use I noticed a minor reaction of flakiness around my eyes and nose. This was most likely from one of the ingredients as this has happened to me before. This may only be a rare issue but if you have sensitive skin I recommend patch testing it a day before use.

Despite this reaction, I recognize that skincare products can vary in their effects from person to person. While the Sukin Foaming Facial Cleanser may not have been suitable for my skin, it still offers effective cleansing properties and natural ingredients that may benefit others.

customer_review_foreign-R1WMW5C1ZJRL04.review_date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 November 2021
customer_review_foreign-R1WMW5C1ZJRL04.review:
This is not what I expected.
Firstly, this not a foam. It is a liquid gel that you pump out of the bottle and have to add water to in order for it to foam up. The smell isn't great. When I opened the bottle and took the pump out, it did smell like lemon meringue as another reviewer had stated. But when, actually pumped out and added to water, the smell changes for some bizarre reason and isn't great. It was more expensive than other brands for the same amount, so not economical. I bought this as my usual brand is unavailable, so I thought I would give this a try as it stated is was a FOAM cleanser. The description is very misleading. A foam cleanser should be foam as it is pumped out of the bottle. This is just a liquid soap. The manufacturer should take note that for it to be a foam cleanser, you need a foaming pump to convert the liquid into foam. The pump provided is not the correct pump for converting the liquid into a foam. Sort it out. I would not recommend this, due to the false advertising of the product.
