text: CeraVe SA Smoothing Cleanser Face Wash For Dry, Rough, Bumpy Skin, Salicylic Acid + Hyaluronic Acid + Ceramides, Exfoliates Face without Disrupting the Protective Skin Barrier, Fragrance Free, 236ml

Product Description.product_description: BHA cleanser for face & body to gently cleanse, soften & smooth out rough, bumpy skin and dry skin prone to redness This gentle salicylic acid cleanser for face & body is ideal for dry skin, rough and bumpy skin, and skin prone to redness. The CeraVe SA Smoothing Cleanser is formulated with salicylic acid to help exfoliate the skin and remove dirt and dead skin cells on the skin without compromising or striping moisture from the skin's natural moisture barrier, leaving the skin feeling clean, smooth and hydrated. This salicylic acid cleanser is also formulated to include hyaluronic acid to hydrate and retain moisture and 3 essential ceramides to moisturise and help support the skin's moisture barrier. This unique combination of ingredients makes CeraVe SA Cleanser an effective way to remove oil, dirt and makeup as well as smooth and improve skin texture. Dead skin cells can build up on the skin surface and create dry patches. Salicylic acid is a BHA which helps in exfoliation of this dead skin and also helps to diminish dry patches and improve skin texture. This BHA cleanser can penetrate deeper into pores than AHAs to enable a deep cleanse and remove built up residue.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
This gentle salicylic acid cleanser for face & body is ideal for dry skin, rough and bumpy skin, and skin prone to redness. Formulated with salicylic acid to help exfoliate the skin and remove dirt and dead skin cells.
Effectively cleanses to remove dirt and oil. Salicylic acid helps exfoliate for soft, smooth skin. Ceramides: Help restore and maintain skin’s natural moisture barrier. Hyaluronic acid: Helps retain skin’s natural moisture.
Suitable for very dry, rough and bumpy skin. Also suitable for skin prone to Keratosis Pilaris. Niacinamide: Helps calm skin.
Salicylic acid is a BHA which helps in exfoliation of this dead skin and also helps to diminish dry patches and improve skin texture. This BHA cleanser can penetrate deeper into pores than AHAs to enable a deep cleanse and remove built up residue.
Developed with dermatologists and #1 Dermatologist Recommended Skincare Brand in the US* Disclaimer: *IQVIA ProVoice Survey, US Dermatologists, 38 skincare categories, rolling 12 months to October 2023.

text: Thayers pH Balancing Daily Cleanser, Face Wash with Aloe Vera, Gentle and Hydrating Skin Care for Dry, Oily, or Acne Prone Skin, 8 FL Oz.

Product Description.product_description: Thayers pH Balancing Gentle Cleanser is formulated with Aloe Vera and Salicylic Acid to visibly improve the quality of skin, balancing skin's pH levels and gently but deeply removing dirt, oil, make up and impurities. This daily cleanser provides a moisturised look and feel, helping to keep skin feeling soft and hydrated. Skin texture is visibly smoother and looks more even. Founded by Dr. Henry Thayer, Thayers Natural Remedies' formula is made from 96% natural origin ingredients including 5% filet of Aloe Vera. The pH Balancing Gentle Cleanser has a jelly-like texture that lathers into a mild foam to gently but deeply cleanse without stripping the skin. Thayers gentle face cleanser is clean in every which way, skin looks healthy – not too oily, not too dry, just right. The Thayers pH Balancing Gentle Cleanser is vegan, cruelty-free, fragrance-free, oil-free and sulphate-free. It's also dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested for use on all skin types, including sensitive. Thayers elixirs have been a fixture in bathroom medicine cabinets for over 170 years. Once you use them, you'll know why.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
pH Balancing Cleanser: Clinically tested to help balance skin’s pH levels. Our gentle face wash removes dirt, oil, and impurities leaving skin feeling clean and not stripped. Skin looks balanced and feels softer after using this foaming facial cleanser
Moisture Barrier Maintenance: Jelly cleanser transforms into a foaming face wash that helps to strengthen the skin barrier and keep skin feeling comfortable and hydrated. Our foaming cleanser acts as a gentle but deep cleanser for pH balanced skin
96% Natural Origin Ingredients: Our face cleanser features hydrating Aloe Vera and sodium hyaluronate. Daily aloe vera face wash cleanses, moisturizes and balances all skin types including oily, dry, sensitive and acne prone skin
Clean in Every Which Way: Our facial cleanser is Ophthalmologist and Dermatologist tested for safety. Fragrance-free, oil-free, sulfate-free, cruelty-free, non-comedogenic and allergy tested skin care formula
Time Tested Remedies: We're committed to excellence with our formulas, featuring classic ingredients we've used for nearly two centuries. Thayers elixirs have been a fixture in medicine cabinets for generations, once you use them, you'll know why

customer_review_foreign-R2FGRZTIW5EZHT.review_title: Lozione perfetta per chi vuole un prodotto delicato, idratante e adatto a tutti i tipi di pelle!
customer_review_foreign-R2FGRZTIW5EZHT.review:
Il Thayers Detergente Viso con Aloe Vera è un prodotto che si adatta perfettamente a chi ha pelle secca, grassa o mista, e cerca un detergente delicato ma efficace.
La presenza dell’aloe vera lo rende particolarmente idratante, mentre la sua formula leggera e non aggressiva è ideale per l'uso quotidiano.
Una delle caratteristiche che mi ha colpito di più è la capacità di detergere a fondo senza lasciare la pelle secca o tesa, come accade spesso con altri detergenti.
Dopo l'applicazione, il viso risulta fresco e pulito, senza quella sensazione di "pelle che tira", che è un problema comune per chi ha la pelle secca o sensibile.
Per chi ha la pelle grassa, aiuta a regolare l'eccesso di sebo senza privare la pelle della sua naturale idratazione.
La consistenza è cremosa e piacevole, e basta una piccola quantità per ottenere una buona schiuma. L'aloe vera ha un effetto calmante che riduce eventuali arrossamenti o irritazioni, rendendolo adatto anche per chi ha una pelle più reattiva o con tendenze acneiche.
Dopo diverse settimane di utilizzo, ho notato che la mia pelle appare più equilibrata, con meno lucidità nella zona T e un miglioramento generale nell'aspetto.
È un ottimo detergente per chi cerca un prodotto versatile, capace di idratare e purificare allo stesso tempo, senza aggredire la pelle.
In conclusione, il Thayers Detergente Viso con Aloe Vera è una lozione perfetta per chi vuole un prodotto delicato, idratante e adatto a tutti i tipi di pelle, con una formulazione naturale che non compromette l'efficacia della detersione quotidiana.

This product is great, my wife uses it a lot. This is my third time purchasing it here however, I'm in the process of returning it.
It usually arrives with a branded tape securing the nozzle. When I unboxed my order on my last purchase, the two bottles were both without the tape and one of the nozzles was opened.
I don't feel safe letting my family use a personal product that isn't properly secured.
Please ensure the products are shipped in a secured manner because it would appear tampered.

While it doesn't smell as good as Maapilim's face cleanser did, it's the only product I've come across since that has felt the best on my skin and provided the most consistent results for my face. Plus, I really like that they have aloe vera in the cleanser formula and that the bottle itself has a pump dispenser as well. Those were a big plus in my book!

Product Description.product_description: Foaming cleanser with Rice Extract gently moisturizes skin with its rich, dense foam.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
Moisturizing, brightening, and detoxifying cleansing foam made with rice water and moringa oil
Its creamy and cushiony texture eases handling and moisturizing ingredients leave skin feeling hydrated after cleansing by minimizing moisture loss
Moringa oil and soapwort
A moisturizing and brightening cleansing line using quality rice water

customer_review-R16Y4SFU370LAD.review: "I am in love with this rice water face cleanser! It's gentle yet effective at removing dirt and impurities from my skin. The rice powder exfoliates my skin without being too harsh, leaving my skin feeling soft and smooth. I also love the fact that it's made with natural ingredients and free from harsh chemicals. It has a pleasant fragrance and doesn't dry out my skin. I highly recommend this face cleanser to anyone looking for a high-quality and safe skincare product."

customer_review-R35INAYMD1YDXL.review: Im absolutely loving this cleanser so far! It smells incredible and a little of it goes such a long way, it lathers on beautifully and leaves the skin feeling fresh, clean and hydrated. It is not stripping which is a huge +++ !! Definitely recommenddd

customer_review-R15061D1BQKX5I.review: Very reliable delivery period. Product is securely packed. I've been using it for more than a week now, 2x a day, day and night. Only a tiny dot on the finger dissolves into rich lather enough to massage into my full face and neck area. I estimate this would easily last me a year. It has very slight rice-y smell which is ok. I have sensitive mature skin but happy to note there's been no adverse effects so far. I've noticed my face feels tighter, cleaner, smoother. I'm hoping to see some dark spots clearing up too, further down the track. Thank you for a great quality and reasonably-priced product.

customer_review_foreign-R3IKOXN26IIZOV.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 April 2025
customer_review_foreign-R3IKOXN26IIZOV.review: Pleasantly surprised. I was looking for an alternative to the checks & balances frothy foam cleanser. Had tried a few foaming cleaners from stores that ended up either too creamy, not enough froth or sud, broke put skin, etc. Decided to try this based on reviews. It foams up nicely. Only small amount of product needed so should last a long time (I recommend gently squeezing out only a small pee size. This product cleaned my face well. Cleared up much of the breakouts from all the other products I tried. Rinsed well. Has a scent but not overpowering & did not bother my skin. About this item
CLEANING ACTION - A super mild, gel cream cleanser that removes dirt & excess sebum without damaging barrier function. Oat based mild cleansing agent for soothing & calming irritated & sensitised skin. Oat based mild surfactant (cleansing agent), creates a low & cushiony lather that effectively dissolves oil, dirt, makeup, and sunscreen, without compromising skin barrier
HYDRATION - Formulated with effective hydrators like Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin B5 and Glycerin to keep skin hydrated & supple even after cleansing. Complimented by Bisabolol & Vitamin B5, which further repairs & restores skin barrier, soothes infammation & acts on visible signs of ageing
CLEAN & TRANSPARENT BEAUTY: This serum is (i) Fragrance-free (ii) Silicones-free (iii) Sulfates-free (iv) Parabens-free (v) Essential Oils-free and (vi) Dyes-free. Also, it is non-comedogenic, oil-free, and hypoallergenic. The key ingredients are sourced from leading suppliers like Croda (UK), and BASF (Germany)
SKIN TYPE - Suitable for ALL skin types, DRY, OILY, COMBINATION, NORMAL, SENSITIVE. Targets sensitive skin, dehydrated skin and damaged skin barrier
HOW TO USE - Apply on wet skin & massage cleanser in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse-off thoroughly. This is a gentle cleanser & produces very little foam yet provides sufficient cleansing without making skin dry. AM & PM. Everyday

I’ve been using the Minimalist Oat 6% Gentle Cleanser for a few weeks now, and overall, I’m really pleased with it. The formula is super gentle on the skin and has a soothing, non-irritating feel, which is perfect for my sensitive skin. It effectively removes dirt and impurities without leaving my face feeling dry or stripped.

The texture is smooth and easy to apply, and it has a mild, pleasant scent. A little goes a long way, so the bottle lasts quite a while. My skin feels really soft and hydrated after use.

The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is that it doesn't lather as much as other cleansers I’ve used, which might be a drawback for those who prefer a foamy wash. That said, it’s still a great product and has worked well for me overall. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a gentle, hydrating cleanser!

After using minimalist oat extract face wash for about a month, I’m extremely satisfied with my experience.
Pros:
- Gentle on the skin, doesn’t make it dry
- Skin feels clean despite not making any lather
- Doesn’t contain any fragrance which shows they haven’t added any artificial, unnatural fragrances in the product
- True to their name, their packing is also minimal which is great to see. Other than the product container which is plastic, there is no other plastic used at all in the packaging which is fantastic

Cons:
- Slightly expensive but worth it. Else, I would say no cons so far

Points to note:
- It doesn’t form any lather
- It doesn’t have any fragrance

Overall experience:
Definitely recommend this product to those with dry/sensitive skin and those looking for a product with minimal chemicals. To my dry skin, it has given a decent all-weather face wash option. I hope they come up with a larger bottle as well

Tips for other buyers:
As it doesn't form any lather, it will get some time to get used to it and to know how much quantity to use.

If you found this review helpful, please give it a thumbs up! 👍

मिनिमलिस्ट ओट एक्सट्रैक्ट फेस वॉश का लगभग एक महीने तक इस्तेमाल करने के बाद, मैं अपने अनुभव से बेहद संतुष्ट हूं।

फायदे:
- त्वचा पर कोमल, इसे रूखा नहीं बनाता।
- बिना झाग बनाए भी त्वचा साफ महसूस होती है।
- इसमें कोई खुशबू नहीं है, जिससे पता चलता है कि इसमें कोई अनप्राकृतिक सुगंध नहीं जोड़ी गई है।
- अपने नाम के अनुरूप, इनकी पैकेजिंग भी बहुत सरल है, जो मुझे काफ़ी अच्छी लगी | उत्पाद के कंटेनर (जो प्लास्टिक का है) को छोड़कर, पैकेजिंग में कहीं भी प्लास्टिक का उपयोग नहीं किया गया है, जो कि शानदार है।

कमियां:
- थोड़ा महंगा है लेकिन प्रोडक्ट की खूबियों के हिसाब से है। इसके अलावा, अभी तक कोई कमी नहीं मिली।

ध्यान देने योग्य बातें:
- यह झाग नहीं बनाता। और ना ही इसमें कोई खुशबू है।

कुल मिलाकर अनुभव:
इस उत्पाद को सूखी/संवेदनशील त्वचा वालों और ऐसे लोगों के लिए जरूर सुझाऊंगा, जो कम केमिकल्स वाले उत्पाद की तलाश में हैं। मेरी सूखी त्वचा के लिए, यह एक अच्छा फेस वॉश विकल्प साबित हुआ है। मुझे उम्मीद है कि कंपनी एक बड़ी बॉटल लाएंगे जिससे बार बार ऑर्डर ना करनी पड़े

अन्य खरीदारों के लिए सुझाव:
क्योंकि इसमें जाग नहीं बनती और ख़ुशबू नहीं आती, तो थोड़ा समय लगेगा इस आदत पड़ने में। और क्योंकि झाग नहीं बनती, तो कुछ दिन लगेंगे समझने में कि इसकी कितनी मात्रा इस्तेमाल की जाये

यदि यह रिव्यू आपके लिए उपयोगी रहा, तो कृपया इसे लाइक करें! 👍

text: Minimalist 2% Salicylic Acid Face Wash For Oily & Acne Prone Skin | Sulphate free | Anti Acne Face Wash With LHA & Zinc For Men & Women, 100 ml 3.4Oz (Pack of 1)

Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
MULTI-LEVEL CLEANSING: Formulated with Capryloyl Salicylic Acid (LHA), which stays on outer layer of skin and provides gentle exfoliation, revealing soft skin, while Salicylic Acid penetrates deep into pores and sebum reduction and oil production. This Salicylic acid and LHA combination provides multi-level cleansing unlike other Salicylic Acid face wash.
SULPHATE-FREE, NON DRYING: Compared to traditional face wash this is formulated with very mild sulfate-free surfactants (cleansers) that provide optimum cleaning along with several hydrating & soothing ingredients like Panthenol (Vitamin B5) for hydrating overall after-feel.
ANTI ACNE: Boosted with anti-bacterial Zinc and Salicylic Acid that effectively controls oil production and acts as a potent anti acne (or pimple) active. Acne Reduction and prevents future breakout for clear looking skin.
CLEAN & TRANSPARENT BEAUTY: This face wash is (i) Fragrance-free (ii) Silicones-free (iii) Sulfates-free (iv) Parabens-free (v) Essential Oils-free and (vi) Dyes-free (vii) Mild Cleanser. Also, it is non-comedogenic, anti-bacterial, and hypoallergenic. Formulated at pH 4.5 - 5.5 with high purity grade Salicylic Acid by Merck, Germany a leading global supplier.
FOR COMBINATION TO OILY SKIN TYPE: Unlike traditional facewash BHA exfoliant are best for combination to oily skin types specially acne prone or sensitive skin. Also, LHA offers a gentle, cell-by-cell exfoliation without any irritation. Formulated for both Men and Women.

About this item
[PERFECT FACE WASH] A gentle and soothing face wash for daily use. Removes dirt and impurities all at once with its rich yet lightweight formula to clear out pores and balance skin.
[5D COMPLEX HYALURONIC ACID]: 8 types of molecules of HA allows moisture to absorb immediately, deeply, and densely inside your skin to by building 3D networks in the layers of the skin to maintain hydration and moisturization to plump your skin.
[HYDRATING FACE WASH] Has a lightweight and refreshing finish, which keeps skin moisturized and a pH level between 5 and 6, which minimizes skin irritation from being too acidic or alkaline.
[SAFE & HYPOALLERGENIC] Free of artificial fragrance, colorants, parabens, mineral oils, isopropyl alcohol, and other ingredients. They've been tested to be not irritating for skin, and the formula is hypoallergenic and suitable for all skin types including sensitive and acne prone skin.
[CLEAN BEAUTY] Our goal is to pursue clean, safe, and sustainable beauty for the future, and so we made our products certified VEGAN and use FSC Certified packaging. All of our products include no animal-derived ingredients or animal testing (cruelty-free).

customer_review_foreign-R35QQ1IXDPFTIJ.review_title: お値段以上とはこのこと
customer_review_foreign-R35QQ1IXDPFTIJ.review:
普通～乾燥肌のアラフォー男性です。
もともとトリデン緑の洗顔を使っていましたがこちらも気になったので購入。
使用感は以下の通りです。

・泡質
1～2cmほど出してから手で泡立ててもしっかりとした泡が作れます。ネット使ったら多分もっとしっかり濃密な感じかも。ほぼ無香です。
空気を含ませてシャバシャバな泡でさらっと洗いもよし、しっかり泡立ててパックのように覆って泡を押すように洗うもよし。

・洗いあがり
泡切れがよくさっぱり感はあるのに突っ張らず、程よい水分感が残っているという印象。
夏場のこの時期なので春秋の揺らぎ時期、冬場の乾燥時期での使用感は今後チェックといったところです。

・効果
ビタミンC配合で毛穴引き締め！とか、ピーリング効果でくすみオフ！とかそういう機能を押している商品でもないので、純粋に肌を優しく洗いたい方にいいかなと。

総評
自分が普通肌なのでこういう商品は問題ないというのはしゃーなしですが、どんな年代でも使ってみて悪くないなって思う商品だと思います。あ、あと容量と泡立ちの都合かなりコスパはいいです。
洗顔をいくつも持つのもちょっとあれですが、普段使いから肌トラブル時の洗顔料としてのサブにはお勧めできると思います。

customer_review_foreign-R3E7P6ZOSKXQGQ.review_date: Reviewed in the United Arab Emirates on 4 January 2025

text: Paulas Choice SKIN PERFECTING 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant, Daily Facial Exfoliator for Blackheads, Enlarged Pores, Wrinkles & Fine Lines, Fragrance-Free & Paraben-Free, Full Size - 118 ml

Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
GENTLE NON-ABRASIVE LEAVE-ON EXFOLIATOR: with 2% BHA (Beta hydroxy acid) to unclog & diminish enlarged pores, exfoliate dead skin cells, smooth wrinkles & brighten & even out skin tone; Combats redness, wrinkles, aging, enlarged pores, & blackheads; PACKAGING MAY VARY
Dramatically improves skin's texture for radiant youthful even-toned skin; Beta hydroxy acid (BHA also known as salicylic acid) mimics the natural exfoliation process of younger skin by helping it shed extra layers while unclogging and clearing pores
HYDRATE, BRIGHTEN & SMOOTH FINE LINES: Our unique, non-abrasive, leave-on exfoliant is gentle enough for daily use on all skin types; Exfoliates dead skin cells while clearing pores for a more even tone, plus it visibly reduces fine lines & wrinkles
Paula's Choice facial exfoliants are gentler on delicate skin of the face & neck than an abrasive face scrub, which can cause micro-tears; A BHA leave-on exfoliator delivers hydration & can exfoliate directly inside the pore & improve how the pore works

customer_review-R1OY4HBAUTAW4W.review_title: Not very gentle + high cost + small volume + slightly hard to apply
customer_review-R1OY4HBAUTAW4W.review: this exfoliant is quite small and is quite expensive for such a small volume. although you do see some progress, its kinda unreliable to use and you have to be able to listen to how your skin feels or reacts. honestly might be a good choice for oily skin individuals but i have combination skin. i have only bought the smallest volume to test it out and if you are to do the same then you may want to buy the product. final remarks: it can leave a stinging sensation if you use it too frequently.

customer_review-R2A5NAC8XNKSS7.review:
This is arguably the best exfoliator I've ever used. Normally, I'm a big fan of Korean skincare as it suits my skin better, but this Paula's Choice BHA exfoliator probably beats any other exfoliator I've used.
Within 1 week of using this, the blackheads and whiteheads on my nose? GONE! It doesn't even sting your skin like many other acid based exfoliators I've used.
I've even tried this where my skin was uneven. Guess what happened? My skin became as smooth as a baby's bottom!
I bought the travel size, which is a bit small (size of my palm). However, you only need one drop a day for results, which is how this tiny bottle lasted me 6 months (and counting!) with half the bottle left.
The design of the bottle is also secure, with a little flip top inside the white screw top (which is very good for travelling in my experience).
To add, I'm a big fan of making my skincare desk aesthetic, and the minimalistic design of this bottle just tops off how good this exfoliator is. Paula's Choice you've done it again!

Pros:
- Smooths skin
- Doesn't sting AT ALL
- Gets rid of blackheads / whiteheads
- Secure flip top
- Aesthetic bottle

Cons:
- NONE!

customer_review-R12L3LU9Z5B08T.review: Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant is a must-have for smoother, clearer skin. It gently targets blackheads, large pores, and fine lines with salicylic acid, leaving skin refreshed and refined. The travel-size bottle is perfect for on-the-go skincare. A staple for any skincare routine!

customer_review-R2JEMM0HVKNI97.review_title: FINALLY. So glad I found this product!
customer_review-R2JEMM0HVKNI97.review:
FINALLY a product that actually addresses the stubborn hormonal blackheads and clogged pores I get on my chin that I’ve never been able to get rid of!
Bye bye deep, sore pimples.
I had some small spots of purging after starting to use this, but I’m not unhappy about it because it just means it’s working and the area that’s been previously untreatable (my chin) is finallyyyy responding to an exfoliant. I’ve found through trial and error that my skin responds much better to BHA’s than AHA’s. The latter are too harsh and strip my skin which is very sensitive and dry. I’ve even been using this product almost every night on my chin, which is much more frequently than I usually use exfoliants but somehow it’s gentle enough not to have me peeling or red and sensitive. Having said that, I don’t think I need to use it this often I’m just overexcited about the results.
I had other paula’s choice products, one with BHA in it and I even used the BHA 9 product for a while but they weren’t nearly as effective as this formula.
I will repurchase this and I’m so glad I found it after reading reviews!

customer_review-R2NXI4MVBXN7UO.review_title: BEST THING YOU CAN EVER DO FOR YOUR SKIN
customer_review-R2NXI4MVBXN7UO.review: This is a travel size bottle, but I bought it so I can try it out. This is the best thing I have ever bought for my skin. I've only used it three times, and it has transformed my skin. I'm a brown girl and hence my skin is naturally dull and has random dark spots. But after just two applications my skin has gotten brighter, clearer, and none of my pores are visible anymore. It is quite strong so you shouldn't use it every day, I use it twice a week. I can literally see my dead skin flaking off so you might want to scrub and moisturizer once that happens to you. I am surely buying the bigger bottle as soon as I'm done with this one. FIVE STARS!

customer_review-R251Y2CHZU27AP.review_title: I saw results within a month
customer_review-R251Y2CHZU27AP.review: After seeing rave reviews on social media I decided to try this exfoliant, rather than using a toner. I am so incredibly pleased with this product. It wasn’t immediate, but I noticed my acne healing quickly and the scars disappear faster than usual. I don’t believe that this can prevent acne (thanks to my hormones for that) but it does a fantastic job of managing it. The instructions are to use it up to twice daily, but I found this dried out my skin (which is weird cuz I’m so oily). Instead I use it every two days, and I use my benzoyl peroxide treatment on every other day. With a niacinamide serum this just works so well. The only downside is that it smells a bit weird, like vinegar. Nevertheless I am recommending it to anyone who will listen to me! If you suffer from persistent acne i really think Paula’s Choice will help you!!

customer_review-R3J26J6FRUGAZ5.review:
Sadly, I'm only giving this 2 stars... and that's because it didn't worsen my skin condition. I wanted to give it 5 when I bought it, after reading all the reviews, doing some "research" and watching docs talk about it on social media.

For the price and the "studies" conducted that back up this product's efficacy, I was expecting a lot more. Not a miracle, just a little improvement, to be realistic. Well... nothing happened. I finished an entire bottle of it and saw no effect.

It seems like SA is a lot like creatine - a hit-and-miss. It works for some people.

customer_review_foreign-R1QV4WN1FMRT3C.review:
The La Roche-Posay Mela B3 Gel is an exceptional product for anyone looking to brighten and even out their skin tone. For optimal results, I recommend applying it after cleansing and toning your skin. Start with a pea-sized amount and gently massage it into your face and neck, allowing it to absorb fully before applying your moisturizer or sunscreen.

For best results, use it both morning and night. Consistency is key, so incorporating it into your daily routine will help you see improvements over time. It’s also essential to use sunscreen during the day, as the ingredients in this gel can make your skin more sensitive to sun exposure.

I've noticed a significant difference in my skin’s clarity and brightness since I started using this gel. It absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave any sticky residue, which is a huge plus. Overall, I highly recommend the La Roche-Posay Mela B3 Gel for anyone looking to enhance their skincare routine!

customer_review_foreign-R3B1USXCJOFIR4.review_title: My favourite gentle, hydrating face wash!
customer_review_foreign-R3B1USXCJOFIR4.review_date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 October 2024
customer_review_foreign-R3B1USXCJOFIR4.review:
I felt compelled to leave this review after being so impressed by a travel size bottle, I had to buy a bigger version!

I think everyone knows the premium quality of CeraVe face products now with their close focus on ceramides and amino acids. They prove to be a brand of particular relevance by being wonderfully affordable and holding tremendous value. This face wash does everything I fell in love with CeraVe for, from being a gentle yet proactive product. The face wash comes out in a cream form which at first appears similar to some other known brands. The main difference, however, comes through once applied to the face at instantly turns into a highly foamy, exfoliating and soothing face wash. Best of all, the creamy texture followed by bubbles feel wondrously hydrating on the skin. As a sensitive skin sufferer, with combination skin, this face wash truly feels just right. It cleanses without stripping too deeply, thus leaving my face feeling supple, especially when using with their face cream.

It's been two months of use for me and my skin honestly have not felt more gentle and spot free. I'll admit when it comes to pigments and acne scars, this face wash misses the needed salicylic acid to tackle blemishes. On the other hand, for long-term use, this face wash becomes the best option to achieving clean, balanced skin.

Lo compré directamente en la tienda de CeraVe en Amazon porque es confiable y definitivamente el producto es el mismo. 10/10

Ich habe mich im Vorfeld über die verschiedenen CeraVe Cleanser informiert und kam am Ende auf dieses Produkt, da es zum einen sehr gut reinigen soll, aber zum anderen gleichzeitig die Haut nicht zu sehr austrocknen sollte, was bei Mischhaut essentiell ist.

customer_review_foreign-R2XYMF2J1A1ZAI.review_title: Not quite as "hydrating" as it would have you believe
customer_review_foreign-R2XYMF2J1A1ZAI.review_date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 January 2024
customer_review_foreign-R2XYMF2J1A1ZAI.review:
Having purchased for the purpose of the highly touted hylarounic acid ingredient, this cleanser actually includes salicylic acid. The ingredients can be seen on the packaging to this extent as well as a brilliant breakdown on cidecoder. Most of us with acne issues on prescribed creams and gels including benzoyl peroxide need to be extremely careful of what we add to our skin. Salicylic acid and benzoyl peroxide do not mix well and completely strip the skin of its natural moisture barrier when used together... Which can lead to more problematic breakouts and irritation, hence why we opt for products known to help with dry and dehydrated skin.
Hylarounic acid isn't listed in the ingredients for this cleanser, instead its sodium hydroxide which is a cousin to hylarounic acid. Kind of a misleading cleanser experience but you live and learn I guess....! Should definitely state more clearly it includes Salicylic-Acid though. Wouldn't recommend for those of us needing a gentle and or hydrating cleanser and on benzoyl or other drying agents.

text: CeraVe Hydrating Foaming Oil Cleanser Face Wash For Normal to Very Dry Skin, Suitable For Baby & Atopic-prone Skin, For Face & Body, Squalane + Triglyceride + Ceramides, Fragrance Free, 236ml

Product Description.product_description: Foaming oil based cleanser with squalane oil and triglyceride for long lasting hydration in normal-to-dry skin. Type of skin: Normal to very dry skin, baby skin, and allergy-prone skin. Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Hydrating Foaming Oil Cleanser gently cleanses and replenishes the skin’s moisture levels for all day hydration. The ultra-mild foaming texture provides a gentle approach to cleansing, without drying out the skin. The transformation of oil to foam when lathered on the skin effectively removes excess dirt and impurities, without stripping the skin moisture barrier, an ideal squalane cleanser formula for those with dry or sensitive skin. Whilst naturally found in skin, the plant-derived qualities of squalene oil and triglyceride work to replenish the skin’s surface after cleansing to provide long-lasting hydration. This squalane cleanser provides a nourishing touch, leaving the skin balanced, soft and smooth, while removing any form of tightness. A nourishing face wash for allergy-prone skin, this oil-based cleanser is non-comedogenic and contains no parabens or dyes, making it suitable for those with eczema-prone skin. Available in 236ML & 473ML Suitable for very dry, rough or bumpy skin Suitable for skin prone to Keratosis Piliaris. Alleviate rough and bumpy skin texture with this fast-absorbing, non-greasy, hydrating smoothing cream. It also features moisturising MultiVesicular Technology [MVE] to maintain hydration levels in the skin for 24 hours. ▪ Micro beads free (no physical exfoliants) ▪ Fragrance-free ▪ Non-irritating ▪ Non comedogenic. Recommended use in conjunction with CeraVe SA Smoothing Cleanser.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Hydrating Foaming Oil Cleanser gently cleanses and replenishes the skin’s moisture levels for all day hydration.
Alleviate rough and bumpy skin texture with this fast-absorbing, non-greasy, hydrating smoothing cream. MVE: to maintain hydration levels in the skin for 24 hours. Micro beads free (no physical exfoliants).
Normal to very dry skin, baby skin, and allergy-prone skin. Suitable for very dry, rough or bumpy skin. Suitable for skin prone to Keratosis Piliaris.
Non-comedogenic, non-irritating and fragrance-free.
Developed with dermatologists and #1 Dermatologist Recommended Skincare Brand in the US* Disclaimer: *IQVIA ProVoice Survey, US Dermatologists, 38 skincare categories, rolling 12 months to October 2023.

El limpiador aceite de ducha de Cerave es un producto altamente recomendado para quienes buscan una limpieza suave que respete y cuide la barrera natural de la piel. Diseñado específicamente para piel normal a seca, su fórmula rica y nutritiva limpia sin causar resequedad, dejando la piel hidratada y confortable.

Características principales:

• Apto para uso diario: Perfecto para incorporar a tu rutina de baño, proporcionando hidratación constante.

El tamaño de 473ml es generoso, ofreciendo una excelente relación calidad-precio para quienes buscan un producto confiable para el cuidado diario de la piel seca o normal.

Si buscas un limpiador que combine eficacia, suavidad y cuidado profundo, el aceite de ducha de Cerave es una opción perfecta. ¡Altamente recomendado para mantener tu piel saludable y protegida!

customer_review_foreign-RC7RQ0MWG3XQ8.review:
Das CeraVe Feuchtigkeitsspendende Reinigungsöl hat sich als ein wahrer Segen für meine Haut erwiesen und ist zu einem unverzichtbaren Bestandteil meiner täglichen Hautpflegeroutine geworden. Als jemand, der unter trockener Haut leidet und nach einer sanften Reinigung sucht, bin ich von diesem Produkt begeistert und möchte meine positive Erfahrung teilen.

Der erste Eindruck von diesem Reinigungsöl ist äußerst positiv. Die leichte Textur fühlt sich sanft auf der Haut an und hinterlässt ein angenehmes, nicht fettiges Gefühl. Die Formulierung ist mit essenziellen Ceramiden angereichert, die dazu beitragen, die natürliche Schutzbarriere der Haut zu stärken und Feuchtigkeit einzuschließen.

Die Wirksamkeit dieses Reinigungsöls ist beeindruckend. Es entfernt sanft und gründlich Schmutz, Make-up und überschüssiges Öl von meiner Haut, ohne sie auszutrocknen oder zu reizen. Selbst wasserfestes Make-up wird mühelos entfernt, während die Haut gleichzeitig mit Feuchtigkeit versorgt wird.

Die Vielseitigkeit dieses Reinigungsöls ist ebenfalls bemerkenswert. Es eignet sich für alle Hauttypen, von normaler bis sehr trockener Haut, und kann mühelos in meine bestehende Hautpflegeroutine integriert werden. Ich verwende es gerne als ersten Schritt meiner Doppelreinigung, um meine Haut gründlich zu reinigen und gleichzeitig zu pflegen.

Die Verträglichkeit dieses Reinigungsöls ist ein weiterer Pluspunkt. Es ist frei von Duftstoffen und Parabenen und wurde von Dermatologen entwickelt, was es besonders schonend und verträglich für empfindliche Haut macht. Das gibt mir das Vertrauen, dass ich ein sicheres und wirksames Produkt verwende, das meiner Haut guttut.

Alles in allem kann ich das CeraVe Feuchtigkeitsspendende Reinigungsöl jedem empfehlen, der nach einer sanften und wirksamen Reinigung für seine Haut sucht. Mit seiner hochwertigen Formulierung, sanften Wirkung und Verträglichkeit ist es eine ideale Wahl für alle, die eine gesunde und strahlende Haut anstreben.

customer_review_foreign-R2SUDKZVTQF9W8.review_title: Reinigt gut und erzeugt kein Hautspannen
customer_review_foreign-R2SUDKZVTQF9W8.review:
Nach mehrwöchiger Anwendung des feuchtigkeitsspendenden Reinigungsöls von CeraVe möchte ich meine Beobachtungen teilen.

Folgendes betrachte ich als positiv:

– Effiziente Reinigung: Das Reinigungöl hat sich als effektiv erwiesen, um Make-up und Schmutz von der Haut zu entfernen. Es besitzt eine angenehme Textur und lässt sich leicht auf der Haut verteilen und einmassieren.

– Feuchtigkeitsversorgung: Das Produkt spendet Feuchtigkeit. Ich habe in der Vergangenheit verschiedene Reiniger ausprobiert und hatte stets mit einem Spannungsgefühl der Haut zu kämpfen. Dieses Problem trat mit diesem Produkt nicht auf und die Haut fühlt sich danach gut an.

– Verträglichkeit: Meine Haut hat keine negativen Reaktionen auf das Produkt gezeigt.

Das Reinigungsöl hinterlässt außerdem keinen Ölfilm nach dem Abwaschen, allerdings dauert das Abwaschen etwas länger als bei anderen Produkten. Gründliches Abwaschen ist wichtig – andernfalls könnten die nachfolgenden Produkte beim Auftragen auf die Haut schäumen oder schmieren.

Folgendes ist für mich neutral und von nicht großer Bedeutung:

– Geruch: Ich bin kein großer Fan davon, aber bei einem Reiniger ist das auch nicht ausschlaggebend. Der Geruch ist zudem nicht besonders stark wahrzunehmen.

Außerdem kam der Reiniger diesmal auf Englisch und nicht Deutsch an. Das scheint bei den CeraVe-Produkten eine Glückssache zu sein.

Ich habe das Produkt bereits zweimal bestellt und würde es in Zukunft auch weiterhin bestellen. Da das Reinigungsöl das macht was es soll, gebe ich fünf Sterne und kann es weiterempfehlen.

Stand: 20.11.2023

customer_review_foreign-R1A4PQ9OZQG7KF.review:
Love this face wash! I take good care of my skin and only want to use the best non irritating products and this is up there with the best.
I start off using the Easy Peasy Oil Cleanser (purchased on Amazon) followed by CeraVe Hydrating Foaming Oil Cleanser for Normal to Very Dry Skin prior to applying my skincare products every evening. This cleanser is non drying and none irritating.
Please note that the cleanser does not come out of the pump container as a 'foam', the liquid becomes a foam after a small amount of water is added which is great as it is more controllable and less messy. The consistency of the liquid is thick which again makes it much easier to control and the fact that it has a pump is another plus. I personally only use this once per day as I do not find it necessary to use any cleanser in my morning routine.
Highly Recommend
PRO'S:
Pump container giving easy controlled access
Only small amount required for whole face and neck
Large size
Value for money
Gentle does not irritate skin so ideal for dry or sensitive skin
Addition of Ceramides and Squalane
Cons:
None so far

Als Mann habe ich oft Schwierigkeiten damit gehabt, ein Reinigungsprodukt zu finden, das meiner Haut Feuchtigkeit spendet und sie gleichzeitig gründlich reinigt. Das feuchtigkeitsspendende Reinigungsöl hat dieses Problem jedoch gelöst und verdient daher eine klare Bewertung von 5 Sternen.

Die Anwendung dieses Reinigungsöls ist einfach und unkompliziert. Es entfernt nicht nur Schmutz und überschüssiges Öl von meiner Haut, sondern hinterlässt auch ein erfrischendes Gefühl, das meine Haut revitalisiert. Das Beste daran ist, dass es meiner Haut gleichzeitig Feuchtigkeit spendet, was besonders wichtig ist, da Männerhaut oft zu Trockenheit neigt.

Nach der Reinigung fühlt sich meine Haut weich und hydratisiert an, ohne dabei fettig oder klebrig zu sein. Dieses Reinigungsöl hat meine Erwartungen übertroffen und ist nun ein fester Bestandteil meiner täglichen Hautpflegeroutine.

Für Männer, die nach einem Reinigungsprodukt suchen, das nicht nur gründlich reinigt, sondern auch Feuchtigkeit spendet und ein erfrischendes Gefühl hinterlässt, kann ich dieses Reinigungsöl nur empfehlen. Es verdient definitiv eine Bewertung von 5 Sternen.

customer_review_foreign-R3U4AQCW8SB3T0.review:
Ich habe mir das CeraVe Feuchtigkeitsspendende Reinigungsöl vor einiger Zeit gekauft und bin bisher recht zufrieden mit dem Produkt. Es verdient definitiv vier Sterne, auch wenn es noch Raum für Verbesserungen gibt.

Zuerst einmal, das Öl erfüllt seine Hauptaufgabe als Reiniger ausgezeichnet. Es entfernt Make-up problemlos und hinterlässt ein angenehm sauberes Hautgefühl. Ich habe normale bis trockene Haut und dieses Reinigungsöl scheint gut mit meinem Hauttyp zu harmonieren.

Darüber hinaus finde ich die Inhaltsstoffe, insbesondere die Ceramide und Squalan, sehr attraktiv. Sie tragen zur Stärkung der natürlichen Hautschutzbarriere bei und helfen, die Haut hydratisiert zu halten, was meiner Haut definitiv zugute kommt.

Die Tatsache, dass dieses Produkt parabenfrei und parfümfrei ist, zeigt, dass CeraVe auf Hautgesundheit und -sicherheit Wert legt. Dies macht es zu einer guten Option für Menschen mit empfindlicher oder zu Allergien neigender Haut.

Allerdings ist der Duft, obwohl er natürlich und nicht aufdringlich ist, nicht mein Favorit. Ich hätte mir gewünscht, dass es duftneutral wäre oder einen angenehmeren natürlichen Duft hätte.

Außerdem finde ich, dass die Flasche etwas groß und sperrig ist, was die Handhabung erschwert. Eine kleinere, kompaktere Verpackung wäre wünschenswert, vor allem für Reisen.

Trotz dieser kleinen Mängel ist das CeraVe Feuchtigkeitsspendende Reinigungsöl ein hochwertiges Produkt, das ich definitiv weiterempfehlen kann. Es bietet eine sanfte, aber gründliche Reinigung und pflegt die Haut, während es reinigt.

This is a really good cleanser and one I’d purchase again.

I use this as either my morning cleanser or as a second cleanse in the evening (when double cleansing to remove spf and/or make up). It’s not going to remove eye make up, namely mascara easily and it stung my eyes a bit when I tried this. So I use another brands oil cleanser then follow with this cleanser and my skin feels lovely and soft. While I get a bit of tightness (this is my normal) after cleansing it’s not exacerbated by using this cleanser.

The pump makes it easy to use - however you don’t need a full pump, a little goes a long way. I got the cleanser on offer so it felt value for money.

It really doesn’t have any scent - which I appreciate as sometimes unfragranced items can smell a bit funky!

customer_review_foreign-R93MHK4VYVY9O.review: L'ho acquistato principalmente per la detersione e per rimuovere io makeup, conscia che questo non è un prodotto per rimuoverlo e soprattutto il brand dice di non usarlo nel contorno occhi. Io mi inumidisco il volto e metto due pump di prodotto tra le mani sfrizionandolo, chiudo gli occhi e lo passo ovunque, insistendo sulla zona occhi dove ho il mascara. Sempre a occhi chiuso apro il rubinetto e rimuovo il prodotto, poi li riapro e con un panno in microfibra rimuovo eventuali residui di makeup. La pelle risulta dopo pulitissima ed effetto rimpolpato quasi, per nulla secca. Dopo mi passo siero e crema viso. È un prodotto valido per ogni tipologia di pelle, grassa o secca. text: SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Light Cleansing Oil 200ml

Product Description.product_description: A lightweight, oil-based cleanser that gently melts away makeup, dirt, oils and sunscreen without stinging the eye area. Soothes and replenishes hydration levels in the skin.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
ALL IN ONE CLEANSER: With this cleansing oil, you can remove everything from base makeup like sunscreen and foundation to color makeup like lipstick and mascara. No need for multiple cleansing. Finish off washing your face quickly and simple with this product.
OIL TYPE CENTELLA EXTRACT: To put Centella Asiatica into oil, we used MCT oil, which consists merely 7% of coconut, as a solvent and succeeded in extracting oil type Centella Asiatica. Unlike other liquid type of it, you can experience deep and pure nature of it.
SAFE AND OPTIMAL FORMULA: Instead of harmful and irritating ingredients, we put only mild and safe ingredients including plant derived oils. It’s a hypoallergenic oil that won’t cause any soar eyes or thick oil layers while using it.
FRESH AND LIGHT TEXTURE: Light and thin oil cleanse deep inside pores and provides fresh feelings after washing. It’d be a great starter for people who haven’t used oil for cleansing their face.
MICELLAR CLEANSING: We’ve come up with our own micellar method to provide unique cleansing oil. It’s a transparent water type at the beginning, but it goes milky as soon as it meets water. This allows thorough cleansing and moist finish.

customer_review_foreign-R1JC1QWV21QW8E.review_title: Gentle and Effective K-Beauty Cleansing Oil for Sensitive, Oily Skin
customer_review_foreign-R1JC1QWV21QW8E.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 June 2024
customer_review_foreign-R1JC1QWV21QW8E.review:
As a facial plastic surgeon, I'm constantly seeking out high-quality skincare products that can benefit both my patients and myself. With the rising popularity of K-beauty products, I couldn't resist trying the SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Light Cleansing Oil. After using this product consistently for several weeks, both morning and night, I feel confident in sharing my thoughts.

I have incredibly sensitive and oily skin, which is prone to breakouts and underlying rosacea. Finding a cleanser that doesn't irritate my skin or exacerbate these issues can be a challenge. However, I'm pleased to report that the SKIN1004 cleansing oil works exceptionally well for my sensitive skin. Throughout my use, I have not experienced any irritation or increase in breakouts.

One aspect of this cleansing oil that I appreciate is its light scent. Many individuals with sensitive skin, myself included, can be easily irritated by strong fragrances. The SKIN1004 cleansing oil has a very subtle, pleasant scent that doesn't overwhelm or cause any discomfort.

It's important to note that proper application and removal techniques are crucial when using an oil cleanser, as improper use can lead to breakouts. To use this product effectively, begin by applying the oil to dry skin and massaging it well. This allows the oil to break down makeup, sunscreen, and other impurities. Next, wet your hands and massage your face again, creating a light emulsion. This step is essential for ensuring that the oil is fully emulsified and can be easily rinsed off without leaving any residue behind. Finally, rinse the product off your face thoroughly with water. I believe that many people experience breakouts with oil cleansers due to improper application or removal techniques, which can leave an oily residue on the skin.

I highly recommend the SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Light Cleansing Oil for anyone looking for a gentle and effective K-beauty cleanser, particularly those with sensitive or oily skin. By following the proper application and removal techniques, you can enjoy the benefits of this cleanser without the risk of breakouts or irritation. The light scent and high-quality ingredients make this product a valuable addition to any skincare routine.

customer_review_foreign-R9ZLBDJ0JSRO2.review_title: Limpieza suave y eficaz para piel sensible
customer_review_foreign-R9ZLBDJ0JSRO2.review:
Compré el [SKIN1004] Madagascar Centella Light Cleansing Oil y estoy encantada con su rendimiento. Este aceite limpiador es suave pero extremadamente efectivo, eliminando todo el maquillaje y las impurezas del día sin dejar la piel reseca o irritada. Lo que más me gusta es su textura ligera que se emulsiona fácilmente con agua, transformándose en una especie de leche suave que limpia profundamente sin sensación grasosa. Es ideal para pieles sensibles como la mía, ya que está formulado con Centella Asiática, conocida por sus propiedades calmantes y reparadoras.

Después de usarlo, mi piel se siente suave, fresca y bien hidratada, sin la típica sensación de tirantez que dejan otros limpiadores. Además, el producto tiene un aroma suave y natural, lo que lo hace aún más agradable de usar. La presentación de 200 ml es perfecta, ya que un poco de producto es suficiente para cada limpieza, por lo que dura bastante. Si buscas un limpiador efectivo y suave que respete tu barrera cutánea, el Madagascar Centella Light Cleansing Oil es una excelente opción. ¡Lo recomiendo mucho!

Ich habe durch diverse Trends oft schon gelesen, dass eine ölhaltige Reinigung auch gegen verstopfte und große Poren helfen kann. Wirklich geglaubt habe ich das nie. Bis jetzt.

Meine Haut ist gemischt, viele glänzende Stellen aber auch trockene Bereiche. Mir wurde daher das Reinigungsöl und der Schaumreiniger empfohlen. Ich habe beides bestellt und direkt probiert.

Der Duft war im ersten Moment nicht das, was ich erwartet hatte - tatsächlich dachte ich im ersten Moment an Sellerie. Keine Ahnung warum, denn der Duft ist ganz leicht und sehr fein. Nach der Anwendung war das dann auch weg und seither riecht es angenehm dezent in Richtung Bergamotte.

Anwendung und Handhabung sind einfach, die benötigte Menge ist zudem gering da beides sehr ergiebig ist. Meine Haut hat etwas gebraucht um sich umzustellen, da sie anfangs noch viel "Fett" nachproduziert hat, was aber mit regelmäßiger Anwendung verschwunden ist. Meine Haut wirkt allgemein heller, sauberer und ich habe immer ein gutes Gefühl danach. Ich kann die Produkte nur empfehlen!

Großer Pluspunkt für mich war die tierversuchsfreie Entwicklung! Da diverse Städte erst kürzlich riesige Versuchslabore gebaut haben (z.B. Augsburg mit über 250.000 Tieren!!), lege ich darauf nun absolut Wert!

My husband and I have been using the SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Light Cleansing Oil for a month now, and we both love it! Not only does it leave our skin feeling clean and refreshed, but it also effectively removes makeup and impurities without any greasy residue.

customer_review_foreign-R2BNGV4CBBXWOI.review_title: A Game-Changer for Gentle and Effective Cleansing!
customer_review_foreign-R2BNGV4CBBXWOI.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 October 2024
customer_review_foreign-R2BNGV4CBBXWOI.review:
I recently started using the SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Light Cleansing Oil Cleanser, and I’m absolutely in love! This product has truly transformed my skincare routine for the better.

Gentle Yet Effective: This cleansing oil is incredibly gentle on my skin while effectively removing makeup, sunscreen, and impurities. I love how it breaks down even the most stubborn makeup without any harsh rubbing. It leaves my skin feeling clean and refreshed without any greasy residue.

Lightweight Texture: The texture is lightweight and silky, making it a pleasure to apply. It glides effortlessly over the skin, providing a luxurious cleansing experience. I appreciate that it rinses off easily with water, leaving no oily film behind.

Skin-Loving Ingredients: The centella asiatica extract is a standout ingredient in this cleanser. It soothes my skin and helps reduce any redness or irritation, which is a significant plus for my sensitive skin. I’ve noticed an improvement in my skin’s overall texture since I started using it.

Great for Daily Use: I use this cleanser daily, and it has become an essential part of my evening skincare routine. It prepares my skin perfectly for the next steps in my regimen, ensuring that my serums and moisturizers absorb more effectively.

Final Thoughts: I highly recommend the SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Light Cleansing Oil Cleanser to anyone looking for a gentle yet effective cleansing solution. It’s affordable, high-quality, and has made a noticeable difference in my skin’s health. This cleanser has earned a permanent place in my skincare lineup!

text: SOME BY MI AHA BHA PHA 30 Days Miracle Acne Clear Body Cleanser, 400 g (Pack of 1)

Product Description.product_description: SOME BY MI AHA BHA PHA 30 Days Miracle Acne Clear Body Cleanser is a gently exfoliating Korean body wash made with gentle exfoliators like AHA, BHA, PHA, as well as tea tree. The combination of these ingredients, coupled with SOME BY MI's patented Truecica and Houttuynia Cordata will help maintain optimal moisture levels, prevent clogged pores and body acne like back acne and chest acne. In addition, it leaves the skin with a calming, soothing and refreshing finish after each use. The smooth, gel like texture of this body wash glides smoothly to effectively lift away impurities for visibly clearer skin. Size: 400g MADE IN KOREA. All of our products are 100% authentic.

This is my second purchase of this bodywash. I love the fresh tea tree smell and the way it cleanses my skin. I use it with an exfoliating rag and I feel squeaky clean.

One thing that I did notice is that it lathers well and it helped with my hyperpigmentation. I noticed after almost finishing the bottle, the skin on my neck was peeling! So just a caution to how often you use it.

I pair it with this other kojic bodywash which really helps to even out my complexion. With continued use, I would expect to see results in two to three weeks.

Tip: This body wash is good at cleaning and removing grime/sweat but might be a bit drying on the skin for some due to the cosmetic acids AHA, BHA, and PHA. If you find that it dries your skin, follow up with a moisturizing body wash such as Dove Bar or Shea Moisture Soap Bar.

text: Avene Eau Thermale Avène Tolerance Extremely Gentle Cleanser 200ml - Cleanser for Hypersensitive Skin

Product Description.product_description: Avene Extremely Gentle Cleanser, this cleanser lotion is a no-rinse, wipe-off formula that helps restore skin barriers while protecting from dryness. Helps soothe skin discomfort, including tingling, burning sensations and tightness. Safe for face and eyes.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
No-rinse, wipe-off formula helps restore skin barrier while protecting from dryness. Leaves skin feeling soft .

customer_review_foreign-R66ZPZYVVFYIY.review_title: My go-to cleanser for sensitive skin
customer_review_foreign-R66ZPZYVVFYIY.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 22 August 2024
customer_review_foreign-R66ZPZYVVFYIY.review:
Finding a cleanser that doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin has always been a challenge, but the Eau Thermale Avène Tolerance Extremely Gentle Cleanser Lotion has been a game-changer. From the first use, I was impressed by how soothing it felt on my skin.

This lotion has a lightweight, milky texture that glides on effortlessly. It gently removes impurities without any harsh rubbing, leaving my skin feeling clean, soft, and comfortable. There’s no tightness or dryness afterward, just a fresh, hydrated feeling.

What really sets this cleanser apart is its minimalist formula. It’s free from potential irritants like fragrances and preservatives, which is perfect for my reactive skin. While it being also non-rinse is a bonus, especially when my skin is feeling extra sensitive. I'm newer to using cleanser that are so, which is the reason behind my review being four stars instead of five.

This cleanser has earned a spot in my routine. If you have sensitive or easily irritated skin, I highly recommend giving this a try—it’s a true skincare staple.

Everyone with rosacea will find something different works for them. I thought I would try this because it's cheaper than the La Roche Posay toleriane gentle cream dermo-cleanser that I find works the best, but also feels a bit gross on my skin - slimy. I also don't like how mucousy this feels on my skin, but indeed it does the job without causing a flare up, whichs surprises me because if I leave it on like I always do with cleansers, it gets a bit stingy. Some cleansers also blow out my pores and this doesn't do that. My skin doesn't dry out, and my toner and moisturiser would also have a part to play in that, but overall I would definitely recommend people with rosacea who are looking for a cost effective cleanser should give this a try.

If it doesn't work, just give it to someone, if you've got a skin condition, it's not worth forging through the rest of the bottle, trust me, you'll wreck your face.

text: Eau Thermale Avene Cleanance Cleansing Gel 400ml - Cleanser for Oily skin, Face and Body, Sebum-Regulating, Soap Free, Paraben Free, Biogradable Formula

Product Description.product_description: Avène Cleanance Cleansing Gel deeply cleanses to remove impurities which block pores (dust, pollution etc.) and reduces excess sebum, without drying out the skin. This soap free cleanser purifies the skin, gently removes makeup, can be used on backne, and can be used as a shaving gel for men with oily skin. Clinically proven to reduce blemishes and blackheads, this biodegradable formula leaves the skin clean, clear and mattified.
Product Description.product_summary:
About this item
EFFICACY : Immediately after application 96% of the skin is free of impurities* Cinically proven to reduce blemishes and blackheads.
MATTIFY : Reduces excess sebum for an immediate and long-lasting mattifying effect over 6 hours *Instrumental measurement on 21 subjects – Single application
INGREDIENTS : 84% natural formula with key ingredients such as Avène Thermal Spring Water with soothing and softening properties, ComedoclastinTM which helps to reduce the appearance of blemishes and limits their reappearance and Zinc Gluconate (antibacterial, sebum regulating).
DIRECTIONS FOR USE : Apply morning and/or evening to wet skin, work up lather, rinse thoroughly then pat dry. If needed, finish with a light mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water, gently pat dry and apply suitable skin care products. It can also be used as a shaving gel for men with oily skin.
SKIN TYPE : For oily, blemish-prone skin, clogged pores, excess sebum. Suitable for teenagers and adults.
*Evaluation of the dermatological and ophthalmological tolerance and efficacy of cosmetic product used under normal conditions in subjects with mild to moderate facial acne, used twice daily, 50 users, 28 days.

Seit Jahren kämpfe ich mit Akne und habe sehr fettige Haut. Mein Hautarzt empfahl mir neben meiner verschriebenen Creme auch das Avène Cleanance Reinigungsgel. Ich benutze es nun täglich morgens und abends und reinige mein Gesicht damit mit warmem Wasser.

Das Gel ist unglaublich ergiebig und hat einen relativ neutralen Geruch, was ich sehr schätze. Für meine fettige Haut ist es sehr gut geeignet, da es gründlich reinigt, ohne die Haut auszutrocknen oder zu reizen.

Die große 400ml Flasche hält bei regelmäßiger Anwendung erstaunlich lange, was das Produkt auch preislich attraktiv macht. Aufgrund seiner Effektivität und Ergiebigkeit kann ich das Avène Cleanance Reinigungsgel wärmstens empfehlen, besonders für Personen mit fettiger und zu Akne neigender Haut.

customer_review_foreign-R3R6UDCXV6APO9.review:
Gel detergente Avène

Dopo qualche settimana di utilizzo posso finalmente fare una recensione accurata del prodotto.

Il gel detergente si presenta in una pratica confezione con dosatore.
Il rapporto qualità/prezzo è ottimo e molto vantaggioso.

All'utilizzo non produce molta schiuma, segno che è ricco di prodotti naturali.
Lascia la pelle ben detersa, morbida e, soprattutto nella zona T, ben opacizzata.
Adatto anche ai più sensibili, si prende cura della pelle senza essere aggressivo e senza creare microlesioni. È particolarmente indicato anche per soggetti con problemi di varia natura, essendo privo di agenti chimici irritanti.

Unico inconveniente: soprattutto nelle giornate più fredde, ho riscontrato un po' di secchezza della pelle dopo l'applicazione, nulla che una crema nutriente non possa risolvere.

Continuerò ad usarlo! Avène è una garanzia.

customer_review_foreign-R3JARF3IED66BN.review_title: Solides Produkt, aber nicht der erhoffte Wow-Effekt
customer_review_foreign-R3JARF3IED66BN.review:
Ich habe das Avene Produkt aufgrund meines fettigen Hauttyps ausprobiert und war neugierig auf die Wirkung von Monolaurin und Zinkglukonat. Die Textur ist angenehm, der Duft schön frisch und die Haut fühlt sich nach der Anwendung sauber an.

Allerdings konnte ich langfristig keine große Verbesserung meines Hautbildes feststellen. Die Talgproduktion wurde nur minimal reduziert, und bei stärkeren Hautunreinheiten wirkte es leider nicht so effektiv wie erhofft. Für empfindliche Haut ist es bestimmt gut geeignet, da es sehr sanft ist – mir persönlich hat aber ein wenig die “Power” gefehlt.

Alles in allem ein solides Produkt, aber für mich kein Nachkauf-Kandidat.

text: Anua Hearleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil 200 ml

Product Description.product_summary:
[GENTLE YET POTENT CLEANSING OIL] Effective in eliminating makeup residue, blackheads and sebum, whilst preventing pore congestion. Essential step for double cleansing, with glowy glass skin results.
[MILD INGREDIENTS ONLY] Formulated with Heartleaf extract for soothing effects on the skin.
[FOR ALL SKIN TYPES] Hypoallergenic & Non-Irritation Test completed, making it suitable for all skin types and especially Sensitive, Acne-Prone Skin.
[GENTLE ON THE EYES] No eye stinging experiences when used around eyes, Eye Irritation Test (Cruelty Free HET-CAM Test) completed.
[HOW TO DOUBLE CLEANSE] ① Apply the cleansing oil to dry skin and gently massage for 1-2 minutes. ② Emulsify with water to effectively remove sebum. ③ Wash off all oil residues by using a water based cleanser.

customer_review_foreign-RWPYAPEIC3P7P.review_title: My new fav, possibly one of my holy Grail facial products
customer_review_foreign-RWPYAPEIC3P7P.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 April 2025
customer_review_foreign-RWPYAPEIC3P7P.review:
This is a good sized amount of product. I originally was going to use two pumps of the product but after the first pump. I could tell I wouldn't need much more so I added a half pump more. So 1.5 pumps total, I could have easily only used .5 or 1 pump. It felt so nourishing on my skin. Like most other double cleansing oils,any times it can leave your vision a little "foggy" for a moment after using, an annoying but harmless side effect. But to my surprise, I didn't have that experience at all. Every product cleansing oil I've tried has always done that to me. So already it was a plus for me.
I'm gently on my eye area so I don't hurt my eyelashes or delicate and thin skin in the eye area..I gently press my fingertips onto the eyelids to "melt" makeup away. I don't ever use a scrubbing motion. This method worked wonderfully as well this time. The cleansing oil spread easily but was not at all runny, nor was it goopy. It was the perfect consistency. No harsh smells or burning or irritating texture against my skin. Great for sensitive and delicate skin. I rinsed my mascara and eyeshadow of easily after 40 seconds of gentle rubbing. No residue left behind and my skin isn't tight and dry and is so wet to the touch. I don't wear much makeup, usually just eyes or long lasting lip color. But I do live in a humid southern USA state and need to get the sticky humid off at the end of a day. Worked wonders. I could have been fine with using just this but I also bought the foam cleanser well and the combination of both was phenomenal for this skincare nerd. I do believe these will last quite some time so makes it great value for the money. Quality skincare and I'm excited to try more of their products!
Pics show my eye makeup before applying, after with it on my skin, and after only rinsing it three times. I used a roll of gift wrapping tape for scale of bottle size.. came with a nice an easy to remove sanitary safety clasp to prevent spillage.

Review of Anua Heartleaf Pore Cleanser and Heartleaf Pore Deep Cleansing Foam

I had high hopes for the Anua Heartleaf Pore Cleanser and Heartleaf Pore Deep Cleansing Foam, but unfortunately, both products were deeply disappointing and caused significant issues for my skin.

Heartleaf Pore Cleanser:
While the cleanser’s scent was subtle and not overpowering, which I appreciated, the product severely irritated my skin. After using it, I experienced a dramatic breakout—something I’ve never dealt with before, apart from an occasional pimple. Despite not having sensitive skin, this product left my face in worse condition than ever. I wanted to love this cleanser, but it has completely ruined my skin’s health.

Heartleaf Pore Deep Cleansing Foam:
The cleansing foam further worsened my experience. It wrecked my skin barrier, leaving it feeling stripped and vulnerable. Even though my skin is usually resilient and not prone to sensitivity, this product caused dryness and discomfort that I hadn’t experienced with other cleansers.

Overall, I wouldn’t recommend these products, especially for those who value maintaining a healthy skin barrier. While they might work for others, my experience has been nothing short of frustrating and damaging.

After incorporating this into my skincare routine for a couple of months, I am officially a convert to double cleansing! I’ve been massaging the oil into my dry face for a minute before I shower at night, rinsing it off with a little water, then following up with a gentle cleanser in the shower. The oil does a great job of removing my makeup and sunscreen, so by the time I follow up with the second wash, it feels like I’m really cleaning my skin, instead of just getting whatever’s on the surface off. It took at least a month to see any visible improvement in my skin, but now I have less prominent sebaceous filaments and my pores look smaller.

It’s definitely worth adding this oil as an additional step in your skincare routine!

I recently started using this face cleansing oil and I must say, it has completely transformed my skincare routine. This product provides a deep and thorough cleanse, leaving my skin feeling refreshed, nourished, and incredibly clean.

First and foremost, the texture of this face cleansing oil is luxurious. It has a lightweight and silky-smooth consistency that glides effortlessly across the skin. The oil effectively removes makeup, dirt, and impurities without stripping away the skin's natural moisture.

One of the standout features of this cleansing oil is its ability to dissolve even the most stubborn makeup. It effortlessly melts away waterproof mascara, long-lasting foundation, and heavy eye makeup, making the cleansing process quick and easy. I no longer have to struggle with multiple products or harsh rubbing to remove my makeup.

Furthermore, this face cleansing oil is incredibly gentle on the skin. It does not cause any irritation or dryness, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. The formula is free from harsh chemicals and fragrances, ensuring a soothing and comfortable cleansing experience.

Additionally, this cleansing oil leaves my skin feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated. It effectively removes impurities and unclogs pores, resulting in a clearer complexion. Even after rinsing off the oil, my skin feels moisturized and supple, without any greasy residue.

Moreover, the fragrance of this cleansing oil is subtle and pleasant. It adds a touch of relaxation to my skincare routine without being overpowering or irritating. The scent is light and refreshing, enhancing the overall experience of using this product.

Another great feature of this face cleansing oil is its versatility. It can be used as a standalone cleanser or as part of a double cleansing routine. The oil effortlessly emulsifies upon contact with water, turning into a milky consistency that rinses away easily, leaving no residue behind.

Overall, I highly recommend this face cleansing oil. It provides a luxurious and effective cleansing experience, removing makeup and impurities while leaving the skin feeling nourished and refreshed.
